00042 //#define VERBOSE_RESIDUAL_PRINTF 1
00045 static btSimdScalar gResolveSingleConstraintRowGeneric_scalar_reference(btSolverBody& body1, btSolverBody& body2, const btSolverConstraint& c)
00046 {
00047         btScalar deltaImpulse = c.m_rhs - btScalar(c.m_appliedImpulse)*c.m_cfm;
00048         const btScalar deltaVel1Dotn = c.m_contactNormal1.dot(body1.internalGetDeltaLinearVelocity()) + c.m_relpos1CrossNormal.dot(body1.internalGetDeltaAngularVelocity());
00049         const btScalar deltaVel2Dotn = c.m_contactNormal2.dot(body2.internalGetDeltaLinearVelocity()) + c.m_relpos2CrossNormal.dot(body2.internalGetDeltaAngularVelocity());
00050 
00051         //      const btScalar delta_rel_vel    =       deltaVel1Dotn-deltaVel2Dotn;
00052         deltaImpulse -= deltaVel1Dotn*c.m_jacDiagABInv;
00053         deltaImpulse -= deltaVel2Dotn*c.m_jacDiagABInv;
00054 
00055         const btScalar sum = btScalar(c.m_appliedImpulse) + deltaImpulse;
00056         if (sum < c.m_lowerLimit)
00057         {
00058                 deltaImpulse = c.m_lowerLimit - c.m_appliedImpulse;
00059                 c.m_appliedImpulse = c.m_lowerLimit;
00060         }
00061         else if (sum > c.m_upperLimit)
00062         {
00063                 deltaImpulse = c.m_upperLimit - c.m_appliedImpulse;
00064                 c.m_appliedImpulse = c.m_upperLimit;
00065         }
00066         else
00067         {
00068                 c.m_appliedImpulse = sum;
00069         }
00070 
00071         body1.internalApplyImpulse(c.m_contactNormal1*body1.internalGetInvMass(), c.m_angularComponentA, deltaImpulse);
00072         body2.internalApplyImpulse(c.m_contactNormal2*body2.internalGetInvMass(), c.m_angularComponentB, deltaImpulse);
00073 
00074         return deltaImpulse;
00075 }
00076

00078 static btSimdScalar gResolveSingleConstraintRowLowerLimit_scalar_reference(btSolverBody& body1, btSolverBody& body2, const btSolverConstraint& c)
00079 {
00080         btScalar deltaImpulse = c.m_rhs - btScalar(c.m_appliedImpulse)*c.m_cfm;
00081         const btScalar deltaVel1Dotn = c.m_contactNormal1.dot(body1.internalGetDeltaLinearVelocity()) + c.m_relpos1CrossNormal.dot(body1.internalGetDeltaAngularVelocity());
00082         const btScalar deltaVel2Dotn = c.m_contactNormal2.dot(body2.internalGetDeltaLinearVelocity()) + c.m_relpos2CrossNormal.dot(body2.internalGetDeltaAngularVelocity());
00083 
00084         deltaImpulse -= deltaVel1Dotn*c.m_jacDiagABInv;
00085         deltaImpulse -= deltaVel2Dotn*c.m_jacDiagABInv;
00086         const btScalar sum = btScalar(c.m_appliedImpulse) + deltaImpulse;
00087         if (sum < c.m_lowerLimit)
00088         {
00089                 deltaImpulse = c.m_lowerLimit - c.m_appliedImpulse;
00090                 c.m_appliedImpulse = c.m_lowerLimit;
00091         }
00092         else
00093         {
00094                 c.m_appliedImpulse = sum;
00095         }
00096         body1.internalApplyImpulse(c.m_contactNormal1*body1.internalGetInvMass(), c.m_angularComponentA, deltaImpulse);
00097         body2.internalApplyImpulse(c.m_contactNormal2*body2.internalGetInvMass(), c.m_angularComponentB, deltaImpulse);
00098 
00099         return deltaImpulse;
00100 }

00108 #define btVecSplat(x, e) _mm_shuffle_ps(x, x, _MM_SHUFFLE(e,e,e,e))
00109 static inline __m128 btSimdDot3( __m128 vec0, __m128 vec1 )
00110 {
00111         __m128 result = _mm_mul_ps( vec0, vec1);
00112         return _mm_add_ps( btVecSplat( result, 0 ), _mm_add_ps( btVecSplat( result, 1 ), btVecSplat( result, 2 ) ) );
00113 }
00114 
00115 #if defined (BT_ALLOW_SSE4)
00116 #include <intrin.h>
00117 
00118 #define USE_FMA                                 1
00119 #define USE_FMA3_INSTEAD_FMA4   1
00120 #define USE_SSE4_DOT                    1
00121 
00122 #define SSE4_DP(a, b)                   _mm_dp_ps(a, b, 0x7f)
00123 #define SSE4_DP_FP(a, b)                _mm_cvtss_f32(_mm_dp_ps(a, b, 0x7f))
00124 
00125 #if USE_SSE4_DOT
00126 #define DOT_PRODUCT(a, b)               SSE4_DP(a, b)
00127 #else
00128 #define DOT_PRODUCT(a, b)               btSimdDot3(a, b)
00129 #endif
00130 
00131 #if USE_FMA
00132 #if USE_FMA3_INSTEAD_FMA4
00133 // a*b + c
00134 #define FMADD(a, b, c)          _mm_fmadd_ps(a, b, c)
00135 // -(a*b) + c
00136 #define FMNADD(a, b, c)         _mm_fnmadd_ps(a, b, c)
00137 #else // USE_FMA3
00138 // a*b + c
00139 #define FMADD(a, b, c)          _mm_macc_ps(a, b, c)
00140 // -(a*b) + c
00141 #define FMNADD(a, b, c)         _mm_nmacc_ps(a, b, c)
00142 #endif
00143 #else // USE_FMA
00144 // c + a*b
00145 #define FMADD(a, b, c)          _mm_add_ps(c, _mm_mul_ps(a, b))
00146 // c - a*b
00147 #define FMNADD(a, b, c)         _mm_sub_ps(c, _mm_mul_ps(a, b))
00148 #endif
00149 #endif
00150 
00151 // Project Gauss Seidel or the equivalent Sequential Impulse
00152 static btSimdScalar gResolveSingleConstraintRowGeneric_sse2(btSolverBody& body1, btSolverBody& body2, const btSolverConstraint& c)
00153 {
00154         __m128 cpAppliedImp = _mm_set1_ps(c.m_appliedImpulse);
00155         __m128  lowerLimit1 = _mm_set1_ps(c.m_lowerLimit);
00156         __m128  upperLimit1 = _mm_set1_ps(c.m_upperLimit);
00157         btSimdScalar deltaImpulse = _mm_sub_ps(_mm_set1_ps(c.m_rhs), _mm_mul_ps(_mm_set1_ps(c.m_appliedImpulse), _mm_set1_ps(c.m_cfm)));
00158         __m128 deltaVel1Dotn = _mm_add_ps(btSimdDot3(c.m_contactNormal1.mVec128, body1.internalGetDeltaLinearVelocity().mVec128), btSimdDot3(c.m_relpos1CrossNormal.mVec128, body1.internalGetDeltaAngularVelocity().mVec128));
00159         __m128 deltaVel2Dotn = _mm_add_ps(btSimdDot3(c.m_contactNormal2.mVec128, body2.internalGetDeltaLinearVelocity().mVec128), btSimdDot3(c.m_relpos2CrossNormal.mVec128, body2.internalGetDeltaAngularVelocity().mVec128));
00160         deltaImpulse = _mm_sub_ps(deltaImpulse, _mm_mul_ps(deltaVel1Dotn, _mm_set1_ps(c.m_jacDiagABInv)));
00161         deltaImpulse = _mm_sub_ps(deltaImpulse, _mm_mul_ps(deltaVel2Dotn, _mm_set1_ps(c.m_jacDiagABInv)));
00162         btSimdScalar sum = _mm_add_ps(cpAppliedImp, deltaImpulse);
00163         btSimdScalar resultLowerLess, resultUpperLess;
00164         resultLowerLess = _mm_cmplt_ps(sum, lowerLimit1);
00165         resultUpperLess = _mm_cmplt_ps(sum, upperLimit1);
00166         __m128 lowMinApplied = _mm_sub_ps(lowerLimit1, cpAppliedImp);
00167         deltaImpulse = _mm_or_ps(_mm_and_ps(resultLowerLess, lowMinApplied), _mm_andnot_ps(resultLowerLess, deltaImpulse));
00168         c.m_appliedImpulse = _mm_or_ps(_mm_and_ps(resultLowerLess, lowerLimit1), _mm_andnot_ps(resultLowerLess, sum));
00169         __m128 upperMinApplied = _mm_sub_ps(upperLimit1, cpAppliedImp);
00170         deltaImpulse = _mm_or_ps(_mm_and_ps(resultUpperLess, deltaImpulse), _mm_andnot_ps(resultUpperLess, upperMinApplied));
00171         c.m_appliedImpulse = _mm_or_ps(_mm_and_ps(resultUpperLess, c.m_appliedImpulse), _mm_andnot_ps(resultUpperLess, upperLimit1));
00172         __m128  linearComponentA = _mm_mul_ps(c.m_contactNormal1.mVec128, body1.internalGetInvMass().mVec128);
00173         __m128  linearComponentB = _mm_mul_ps((c.m_contactNormal2).mVec128, body2.internalGetInvMass().mVec128);
00174         __m128 impulseMagnitude = deltaImpulse;
00175         body1.internalGetDeltaLinearVelocity().mVec128 = _mm_add_ps(body1.internalGetDeltaLinearVelocity().mVec128, _mm_mul_ps(linearComponentA, impulseMagnitude));
00176         body1.internalGetDeltaAngularVelocity().mVec128 = _mm_add_ps(body1.internalGetDeltaAngularVelocity().mVec128, _mm_mul_ps(c.m_angularComponentA.mVec128, impulseMagnitude));
00177         body2.internalGetDeltaLinearVelocity().mVec128 = _mm_add_ps(body2.internalGetDeltaLinearVelocity().mVec128, _mm_mul_ps(linearComponentB, impulseMagnitude));
00178         body2.internalGetDeltaAngularVelocity().mVec128 = _mm_add_ps(body2.internalGetDeltaAngularVelocity().mVec128, _mm_mul_ps(c.m_angularComponentB.mVec128, impulseMagnitude));
00179         return deltaImpulse;
00180 }

00182 
00183 // Enhanced version of gResolveSingleConstraintRowGeneric_sse2 with SSE4.1 and FMA3
00184 static btSimdScalar gResolveSingleConstraintRowGeneric_sse4_1_fma3(btSolverBody& body1, btSolverBody& body2, const btSolverConstraint& c)
00185 {
00186 #if defined (BT_ALLOW_SSE4)
00187         __m128 tmp                                      = _mm_set_ps1(c.m_jacDiagABInv);
00188         __m128 deltaImpulse                     = _mm_set_ps1(c.m_rhs - btScalar(c.m_appliedImpulse)*c.m_cfm);
00189         const __m128 lowerLimit         = _mm_set_ps1(c.m_lowerLimit);
00190         const __m128 upperLimit         = _mm_set_ps1(c.m_upperLimit);
00191         const __m128 deltaVel1Dotn      = _mm_add_ps(DOT_PRODUCT(c.m_contactNormal1.mVec128, body1.internalGetDeltaLinearVelocity().mVec128), DOT_PRODUCT(c.m_relpos1CrossNormal.mVec128, body1.internalGetDeltaAngularVelocity().mVec128));
00192         const __m128 deltaVel2Dotn      = _mm_add_ps(DOT_PRODUCT(c.m_contactNormal2.mVec128, body2.internalGetDeltaLinearVelocity().mVec128), DOT_PRODUCT(c.m_relpos2CrossNormal.mVec128, body2.internalGetDeltaAngularVelocity().mVec128));
00193         deltaImpulse                            = FMNADD(deltaVel1Dotn, tmp, deltaImpulse);
00194         deltaImpulse                            = FMNADD(deltaVel2Dotn, tmp, deltaImpulse);
00195         tmp                                                     = _mm_add_ps(c.m_appliedImpulse, deltaImpulse); // sum
00196         const __m128 maskLower          = _mm_cmpgt_ps(tmp, lowerLimit);
00197         const __m128 maskUpper          = _mm_cmpgt_ps(upperLimit, tmp);
00198         deltaImpulse                            = _mm_blendv_ps(_mm_sub_ps(lowerLimit, c.m_appliedImpulse), _mm_blendv_ps(_mm_sub_ps(upperLimit, c.m_appliedImpulse), deltaImpulse, maskUpper), maskLower);
00199         c.m_appliedImpulse                      = _mm_blendv_ps(lowerLimit, _mm_blendv_ps(upperLimit, tmp, maskUpper), maskLower);
00200         body1.internalGetDeltaLinearVelocity().mVec128  = FMADD(_mm_mul_ps(c.m_contactNormal1.mVec128, body1.internalGetInvMass().mVec128), deltaImpulse, body1.internalGetDeltaLinearVelocity().mVec128);
00201         body1.internalGetDeltaAngularVelocity().mVec128 = FMADD(c.m_angularComponentA.mVec128, deltaImpulse, body1.internalGetDeltaAngularVelocity().mVec128);
00202         body2.internalGetDeltaLinearVelocity().mVec128  = FMADD(_mm_mul_ps(c.m_contactNormal2.mVec128, body2.internalGetInvMass().mVec128), deltaImpulse, body2.internalGetDeltaLinearVelocity().mVec128);
00203         body2.internalGetDeltaAngularVelocity().mVec128 = FMADD(c.m_angularComponentB.mVec128, deltaImpulse, body2.internalGetDeltaAngularVelocity().mVec128);
00204         return deltaImpulse;
00205 #else
00206         return gResolveSingleConstraintRowGeneric_sse2(body1,body2,c);
00207 #endif
00208 }

00212 static btSimdScalar gResolveSingleConstraintRowLowerLimit_sse2(btSolverBody& body1, btSolverBody& body2, const btSolverConstraint& c)
00213 {
00214         __m128 cpAppliedImp = _mm_set1_ps(c.m_appliedImpulse);
00215         __m128  lowerLimit1 = _mm_set1_ps(c.m_lowerLimit);
00216         __m128  upperLimit1 = _mm_set1_ps(c.m_upperLimit);
00217         btSimdScalar deltaImpulse = _mm_sub_ps(_mm_set1_ps(c.m_rhs), _mm_mul_ps(_mm_set1_ps(c.m_appliedImpulse), _mm_set1_ps(c.m_cfm)));
00218         __m128 deltaVel1Dotn = _mm_add_ps(btSimdDot3(c.m_contactNormal1.mVec128, body1.internalGetDeltaLinearVelocity().mVec128), btSimdDot3(c.m_relpos1CrossNormal.mVec128, body1.internalGetDeltaAngularVelocity().mVec128));
00219         __m128 deltaVel2Dotn = _mm_add_ps(btSimdDot3(c.m_contactNormal2.mVec128, body2.internalGetDeltaLinearVelocity().mVec128), btSimdDot3(c.m_relpos2CrossNormal.mVec128, body2.internalGetDeltaAngularVelocity().mVec128));
00220         deltaImpulse = _mm_sub_ps(deltaImpulse, _mm_mul_ps(deltaVel1Dotn, _mm_set1_ps(c.m_jacDiagABInv)));
00221         deltaImpulse = _mm_sub_ps(deltaImpulse, _mm_mul_ps(deltaVel2Dotn, _mm_set1_ps(c.m_jacDiagABInv)));
00222         btSimdScalar sum = _mm_add_ps(cpAppliedImp, deltaImpulse);
00223         btSimdScalar resultLowerLess, resultUpperLess;
00224         resultLowerLess = _mm_cmplt_ps(sum, lowerLimit1);
00225         resultUpperLess = _mm_cmplt_ps(sum, upperLimit1);
00226         __m128 lowMinApplied = _mm_sub_ps(lowerLimit1, cpAppliedImp);
00227         deltaImpulse = _mm_or_ps(_mm_and_ps(resultLowerLess, lowMinApplied), _mm_andnot_ps(resultLowerLess, deltaImpulse));
00228         c.m_appliedImpulse = _mm_or_ps(_mm_and_ps(resultLowerLess, lowerLimit1), _mm_andnot_ps(resultLowerLess, sum));
00229         __m128  linearComponentA = _mm_mul_ps(c.m_contactNormal1.mVec128, body1.internalGetInvMass().mVec128);
00230         __m128  linearComponentB = _mm_mul_ps(c.m_contactNormal2.mVec128, body2.internalGetInvMass().mVec128);
00231         __m128 impulseMagnitude = deltaImpulse;
00232         body1.internalGetDeltaLinearVelocity().mVec128 = _mm_add_ps(body1.internalGetDeltaLinearVelocity().mVec128, _mm_mul_ps(linearComponentA, impulseMagnitude));
00233         body1.internalGetDeltaAngularVelocity().mVec128 = _mm_add_ps(body1.internalGetDeltaAngularVelocity().mVec128, _mm_mul_ps(c.m_angularComponentA.mVec128, impulseMagnitude));
00234         body2.internalGetDeltaLinearVelocity().mVec128 = _mm_add_ps(body2.internalGetDeltaLinearVelocity().mVec128, _mm_mul_ps(linearComponentB, impulseMagnitude));
00235         body2.internalGetDeltaAngularVelocity().mVec128 = _mm_add_ps(body2.internalGetDeltaAngularVelocity().mVec128, _mm_mul_ps(c.m_angularComponentB.mVec128, impulseMagnitude));
00236         return deltaImpulse;
00237 }

00240 // Enhanced version of gResolveSingleConstraintRowGeneric_sse2 with SSE4.1 and FMA3
00241 static btSimdScalar gResolveSingleConstraintRowLowerLimit_sse4_1_fma3(btSolverBody& body1, btSolverBody& body2, const btSolverConstraint& c)
00242 {
00243 #ifdef BT_ALLOW_SSE4
00244         __m128 tmp                                      = _mm_set_ps1(c.m_jacDiagABInv);
00245         __m128 deltaImpulse                     = _mm_set_ps1(c.m_rhs - btScalar(c.m_appliedImpulse)*c.m_cfm);
00246         const __m128 lowerLimit         = _mm_set_ps1(c.m_lowerLimit);
00247         const __m128 deltaVel1Dotn      = _mm_add_ps(DOT_PRODUCT(c.m_contactNormal1.mVec128, body1.internalGetDeltaLinearVelocity().mVec128), DOT_PRODUCT(c.m_relpos1CrossNormal.mVec128, body1.internalGetDeltaAngularVelocity().mVec128));
00248         const __m128 deltaVel2Dotn      = _mm_add_ps(DOT_PRODUCT(c.m_contactNormal2.mVec128, body2.internalGetDeltaLinearVelocity().mVec128), DOT_PRODUCT(c.m_relpos2CrossNormal.mVec128, body2.internalGetDeltaAngularVelocity().mVec128));
00249         deltaImpulse                            = FMNADD(deltaVel1Dotn, tmp, deltaImpulse);
00250         deltaImpulse                            = FMNADD(deltaVel2Dotn, tmp, deltaImpulse);
00251         tmp                                                     = _mm_add_ps(c.m_appliedImpulse, deltaImpulse);
00252         const __m128 mask                       = _mm_cmpgt_ps(tmp, lowerLimit);
00253         deltaImpulse                            = _mm_blendv_ps(_mm_sub_ps(lowerLimit, c.m_appliedImpulse), deltaImpulse, mask);
00254         c.m_appliedImpulse                      = _mm_blendv_ps(lowerLimit, tmp, mask);
00255         body1.internalGetDeltaLinearVelocity().mVec128  = FMADD(_mm_mul_ps(c.m_contactNormal1.mVec128, body1.internalGetInvMass().mVec128), deltaImpulse, body1.internalGetDeltaLinearVelocity().mVec128);
00256         body1.internalGetDeltaAngularVelocity().mVec128 = FMADD(c.m_angularComponentA.mVec128, deltaImpulse, body1.internalGetDeltaAngularVelocity().mVec128);
00257         body2.internalGetDeltaLinearVelocity().mVec128  = FMADD(_mm_mul_ps(c.m_contactNormal2.mVec128, body2.internalGetInvMass().mVec128), deltaImpulse, body2.internalGetDeltaLinearVelocity().mVec128);
00258         body2.internalGetDeltaAngularVelocity().mVec128 = FMADD(c.m_angularComponentB.mVec128, deltaImpulse, body2.internalGetDeltaAngularVelocity().mVec128);
00259         return deltaImpulse;
00260 #else
00261         return gResolveSingleConstraintRowLowerLimit_sse2(body1,body2,c);
00262 #endif //BT_ALLOW_SSE4
00263 }

00292 
00293 static btSimdScalar gResolveSplitPenetrationImpulse_scalar_reference(
00294         btSolverBody& body1,
00295         btSolverBody& body2,
00296         const btSolverConstraint& c)
00297 {
00298         btScalar deltaImpulse = 0.f;
00299 
00300                 if (c.m_rhsPenetration)
00301         {
00302                         gNumSplitImpulseRecoveries++;
00303                         deltaImpulse = c.m_rhsPenetration-btScalar(c.m_appliedPushImpulse)*c.m_cfm;
00304                         const btScalar deltaVel1Dotn    =       c.m_contactNormal1.dot(body1.internalGetPushVelocity())         + c.m_relpos1CrossNormal.dot(body1.internalGetTurnVelocity());
00305                         const btScalar deltaVel2Dotn    =       c.m_contactNormal2.dot(body2.internalGetPushVelocity())         + c.m_relpos2CrossNormal.dot(body2.internalGetTurnVelocity());
00306 
00307                         deltaImpulse    -=      deltaVel1Dotn*c.m_jacDiagABInv;
00308                         deltaImpulse    -=      deltaVel2Dotn*c.m_jacDiagABInv;
00309                         const btScalar sum = btScalar(c.m_appliedPushImpulse) + deltaImpulse;
00310                         if (sum < c.m_lowerLimit)
00311                         {
00312                                 deltaImpulse = c.m_lowerLimit-c.m_appliedPushImpulse;
00313                                 c.m_appliedPushImpulse = c.m_lowerLimit;
00314                         }
00315                         else
00316                         {
00317                                 c.m_appliedPushImpulse = sum;
00318                         }
00319                         body1.internalApplyPushImpulse(c.m_contactNormal1*body1.internalGetInvMass(),c.m_angularComponentA,deltaImpulse);
00320                         body2.internalApplyPushImpulse(c.m_contactNormal2*body2.internalGetInvMass(),c.m_angularComponentB,deltaImpulse);
00321         }
00322                 return deltaImpulse;
00323 }
00324 
00325 static btSimdScalar gResolveSplitPenetrationImpulse_sse2(btSolverBody& body1,btSolverBody& body2,const btSolverConstraint& c)
00326 {
00327 #ifdef USE_SIMD
00328         if (!c.m_rhsPenetration)
00329                 return 0.f;
00330 
00331         gNumSplitImpulseRecoveries++;
00332 
00333         __m128 cpAppliedImp = _mm_set1_ps(c.m_appliedPushImpulse);
00334         __m128  lowerLimit1 = _mm_set1_ps(c.m_lowerLimit);
00335         __m128  upperLimit1 = _mm_set1_ps(c.m_upperLimit);
00336         __m128 deltaImpulse = _mm_sub_ps(_mm_set1_ps(c.m_rhsPenetration), _mm_mul_ps(_mm_set1_ps(c.m_appliedPushImpulse),_mm_set1_ps(c.m_cfm)));
00337         __m128 deltaVel1Dotn    =       _mm_add_ps(btSimdDot3(c.m_contactNormal1.mVec128,body1.internalGetPushVelocity().mVec128), btSimdDot3(c.m_relpos1CrossNormal.mVec128,body1.internalGetTurnVelocity().mVec128));
00338         __m128 deltaVel2Dotn    =       _mm_add_ps(btSimdDot3(c.m_contactNormal2.mVec128,body2.internalGetPushVelocity().mVec128), btSimdDot3(c.m_relpos2CrossNormal.mVec128,body2.internalGetTurnVelocity().mVec128));
00339         deltaImpulse    =       _mm_sub_ps(deltaImpulse,_mm_mul_ps(deltaVel1Dotn,_mm_set1_ps(c.m_jacDiagABInv)));
00340         deltaImpulse    =       _mm_sub_ps(deltaImpulse,_mm_mul_ps(deltaVel2Dotn,_mm_set1_ps(c.m_jacDiagABInv)));
00341         btSimdScalar sum = _mm_add_ps(cpAppliedImp,deltaImpulse);
00342         btSimdScalar resultLowerLess,resultUpperLess;
00343         resultLowerLess = _mm_cmplt_ps(sum,lowerLimit1);
00344         resultUpperLess = _mm_cmplt_ps(sum,upperLimit1);
00345         __m128 lowMinApplied = _mm_sub_ps(lowerLimit1,cpAppliedImp);
00346         deltaImpulse = _mm_or_ps( _mm_and_ps(resultLowerLess, lowMinApplied), _mm_andnot_ps(resultLowerLess, deltaImpulse) );
00347         c.m_appliedPushImpulse = _mm_or_ps( _mm_and_ps(resultLowerLess, lowerLimit1), _mm_andnot_ps(resultLowerLess, sum) );
00348         __m128  linearComponentA = _mm_mul_ps(c.m_contactNormal1.mVec128,body1.internalGetInvMass().mVec128);
00349         __m128  linearComponentB = _mm_mul_ps(c.m_contactNormal2.mVec128,body2.internalGetInvMass().mVec128);
00350         __m128 impulseMagnitude = deltaImpulse;
00351         body1.internalGetPushVelocity().mVec128 = _mm_add_ps(body1.internalGetPushVelocity().mVec128,_mm_mul_ps(linearComponentA,impulseMagnitude));
00352         body1.internalGetTurnVelocity().mVec128 = _mm_add_ps(body1.internalGetTurnVelocity().mVec128 ,_mm_mul_ps(c.m_angularComponentA.mVec128,impulseMagnitude));
00353         body2.internalGetPushVelocity().mVec128 = _mm_add_ps(body2.internalGetPushVelocity().mVec128,_mm_mul_ps(linearComponentB,impulseMagnitude));
00354         body2.internalGetTurnVelocity().mVec128 = _mm_add_ps(body2.internalGetTurnVelocity().mVec128 ,_mm_mul_ps(c.m_angularComponentB.mVec128,impulseMagnitude));
00355         return deltaImpulse;
00356 #else
00357         return gResolveSplitPenetrationImpulse_scalar_reference(body1,body2,c);
00358 #endif
00359 }
00360 
00361 
00362 btSequentialImpulseConstraintSolver::btSequentialImpulseConstraintSolver()
00363 {
00364     m_btSeed2 = 0;
00365     m_cachedSolverMode = 0;
00366     setupSolverFunctions( false );
00367 }

00369 void btSequentialImpulseConstraintSolver::setupSolverFunctions( bool useSimd )
00370 {
00371     m_resolveSingleConstraintRowGeneric = gResolveSingleConstraintRowGeneric_scalar_reference;
00372     m_resolveSingleConstraintRowLowerLimit = gResolveSingleConstraintRowLowerLimit_scalar_reference;
00373     m_resolveSplitPenetrationImpulse = gResolveSplitPenetrationImpulse_scalar_reference;
00374 
00375     if ( useSimd )
00376     {
00377 #ifdef USE_SIMD
00378         m_resolveSingleConstraintRowGeneric = gResolveSingleConstraintRowGeneric_sse2;
00379         m_resolveSingleConstraintRowLowerLimit = gResolveSingleConstraintRowLowerLimit_sse2;
00380         m_resolveSplitPenetrationImpulse = gResolveSplitPenetrationImpulse_sse2;
00381 
00382 #ifdef BT_ALLOW_SSE4
00383         int cpuFeatures = btCpuFeatureUtility::getCpuFeatures();
00384         if ((cpuFeatures & btCpuFeatureUtility::CPU_FEATURE_FMA3) && (cpuFeatures & btCpuFeatureUtility::CPU_FEATURE_SSE4_1))
00385         {
00386             m_resolveSingleConstraintRowGeneric = gResolveSingleConstraintRowGeneric_sse4_1_fma3;
00387             m_resolveSingleConstraintRowLowerLimit = gResolveSingleConstraintRowLowerLimit_sse4_1_fma3;
00388         }
00389 #endif//BT_ALLOW_SSE4
00390 #endif //USE_SIMD
00391     }
00392 }

00429 
00430 unsigned long btSequentialImpulseConstraintSolver::btRand2()
00431 {
00432         m_btSeed2 = (1664525L*m_btSeed2 + 1013904223L) & 0xffffffff;
00433         return m_btSeed2;
00434 }
00435 
00436 
00437 
00438 //See ODE: adam's all-int straightforward(?) dRandInt (0..n-1)
00439 int btSequentialImpulseConstraintSolver::btRandInt2 (int n)
00440 {
00441         // seems good; xor-fold and modulus
00442         const unsigned long un = static_cast<unsigned long>(n);
00443         unsigned long r = btRand2();
00444 
00445         // note: probably more aggressive than it needs to be -- might be
00446         //       able to get away without one or two of the innermost branches.
00447         if (un <= 0x00010000UL) {
00448                 r ^= (r >> 16);
00449                 if (un <= 0x00000100UL) {
00450                         r ^= (r >> 8);
00451                         if (un <= 0x00000010UL) {
00452                                 r ^= (r >> 4);
00453                                 if (un <= 0x00000004UL) {
00454                                         r ^= (r >> 2);
00455                                         if (un <= 0x00000002UL) {
00456                                                 r ^= (r >> 1);
00457                                         }
00458                                 }
00459                         }
00460                 }
00461         }
00462 
00463         return (int) (r % un);
00464 }
00465 
00466 
00467 
00468 void    btSequentialImpulseConstraintSolver::initSolverBody(btSolverBody* solverBody, btCollisionObject* collisionObject, btScalar timeStep)
00469 {
00470 
00471         btRigidBody* rb = collisionObject? btRigidBody::upcast(collisionObject) : 0;
00472 
00473         solverBody->internalGetDeltaLinearVelocity().setValue(0.f,0.f,0.f);
00474         solverBody->internalGetDeltaAngularVelocity().setValue(0.f,0.f,0.f);
00475         solverBody->internalGetPushVelocity().setValue(0.f,0.f,0.f);
00476         solverBody->internalGetTurnVelocity().setValue(0.f,0.f,0.f);
00477 
00478         if (rb)
00479         {
00480                 solverBody->m_worldTransform = rb->getWorldTransform();
00481                 solverBody->internalSetInvMass(btVector3(rb->getInvMass(),rb->getInvMass(),rb->getInvMass())*rb->getLinearFactor());
00482                 solverBody->m_originalBody = rb;
00483                 solverBody->m_angularFactor = rb->getAngularFactor();
00484                 solverBody->m_linearFactor = rb->getLinearFactor();
00485                 solverBody->m_linearVelocity = rb->getLinearVelocity();
00486                 solverBody->m_angularVelocity = rb->getAngularVelocity();
00487                 solverBody->m_externalForceImpulse = rb->getTotalForce()*rb->getInvMass()*timeStep;
00488                 solverBody->m_externalTorqueImpulse = rb->getTotalTorque()*rb->getInvInertiaTensorWorld()*timeStep ;
00489 
00490         } else
00491         {
00492                 solverBody->m_worldTransform.setIdentity();
00493                 solverBody->internalSetInvMass(btVector3(0,0,0));
00494                 solverBody->m_originalBody = 0;
00495                 solverBody->m_angularFactor.setValue(1,1,1);
00496                 solverBody->m_linearFactor.setValue(1,1,1);
00497                 solverBody->m_linearVelocity.setValue(0,0,0);
00498                 solverBody->m_angularVelocity.setValue(0,0,0);
00499                 solverBody->m_externalForceImpulse.setValue(0,0,0);
00500                 solverBody->m_externalTorqueImpulse.setValue(0,0,0);
00501         }
00502 
00503 
00504 }
00505 
00506 
00507 
00508 
00509 
00510 
00511 btScalar btSequentialImpulseConstraintSolver::restitutionCurve(btScalar rel_vel, btScalar restitution, btScalar velocityThreshold)
00512 {
00513         //printf("rel_vel =%f\n", rel_vel);
00514         if (btFabs(rel_vel)<velocityThreshold)
00515                 return 0.;
00516 
00517         btScalar rest = restitution * -rel_vel;
00518         return rest;
00519 }
00520 
00521 
00522 
00523 void    btSequentialImpulseConstraintSolver::applyAnisotropicFriction(btCollisionObject* colObj,btVector3& frictionDirection, int frictionMode)
00524 {
00525 
00526 
00527         if (colObj && colObj->hasAnisotropicFriction(frictionMode))
00528         {
00529                 // transform to local coordinates
00530                 btVector3 loc_lateral = frictionDirection * colObj->getWorldTransform().getBasis();
00531                 const btVector3& friction_scaling = colObj->getAnisotropicFriction();
00532                 //apply anisotropic friction
00533                 loc_lateral *= friction_scaling;
00534                 // ... and transform it back to global coordinates
00535                 frictionDirection = colObj->getWorldTransform().getBasis() * loc_lateral;
00536         }
00537 
00538 }
00539 
00540 
00541 
00542 
00543 void btSequentialImpulseConstraintSolver::setupFrictionConstraint(btSolverConstraint& solverConstraint, const btVector3& normalAxis,int  solverBodyIdA,int solverBodyIdB,btManifoldPoint& cp,const btVector3& rel_pos1,const btVector3& rel_pos2,btCollisionObject* colObj0,btCollisionObject* colObj1, btScalar relaxation, const btContactSolverInfo& infoGlobal, btScalar desiredVelocity, btScalar cfmSlip)
00544 {
00545 
00546 
00547         btSolverBody& solverBodyA = m_tmpSolverBodyPool[solverBodyIdA];
00548         btSolverBody& solverBodyB = m_tmpSolverBodyPool[solverBodyIdB];
00549 
00550         btRigidBody* body0 = m_tmpSolverBodyPool[solverBodyIdA].m_originalBody;
00551         btRigidBody* body1 = m_tmpSolverBodyPool[solverBodyIdB].m_originalBody;
00552 
00553         solverConstraint.m_solverBodyIdA = solverBodyIdA;
00554         solverConstraint.m_solverBodyIdB = solverBodyIdB;
00555 
00556         solverConstraint.m_friction = cp.m_combinedFriction;
00557         solverConstraint.m_originalContactPoint = 0;
00558 
00559         solverConstraint.m_appliedImpulse = 0.f;
00560         solverConstraint.m_appliedPushImpulse = 0.f;
00561 
00562         if (body0)
00563         {
00564                 solverConstraint.m_contactNormal1 = normalAxis;
00565                 btVector3 ftorqueAxis1 = rel_pos1.cross(solverConstraint.m_contactNormal1);
00566                 solverConstraint.m_relpos1CrossNormal = ftorqueAxis1;
00567                 solverConstraint.m_angularComponentA = body0->getInvInertiaTensorWorld()*ftorqueAxis1*body0->getAngularFactor();
00568         }else
00569         {
00570                 solverConstraint.m_contactNormal1.setZero();
00571                 solverConstraint.m_relpos1CrossNormal.setZero();
00572                 solverConstraint.m_angularComponentA .setZero();
00573         }
00574 
00575         if (body1)
00576         {
00577                 solverConstraint.m_contactNormal2 = -normalAxis;
00578                 btVector3 ftorqueAxis1 = rel_pos2.cross(solverConstraint.m_contactNormal2);
00579                 solverConstraint.m_relpos2CrossNormal = ftorqueAxis1;
00580                 solverConstraint.m_angularComponentB = body1->getInvInertiaTensorWorld()*ftorqueAxis1*body1->getAngularFactor();
00581         } else
00582         {
00583                 solverConstraint.m_contactNormal2.setZero();
00584                 solverConstraint.m_relpos2CrossNormal.setZero();
00585                 solverConstraint.m_angularComponentB.setZero();
00586         }
00587 
00588         {
00589                 btVector3 vec;
00590                 btScalar denom0 = 0.f;
00591                 btScalar denom1 = 0.f;
00592                 if (body0)
00593                 {
00594                         vec = ( solverConstraint.m_angularComponentA).cross(rel_pos1);
00595                         denom0 = body0->getInvMass() + normalAxis.dot(vec);
00596                 }
00597                 if (body1)
00598                 {
00599                         vec = ( -solverConstraint.m_angularComponentB).cross(rel_pos2);
00600                         denom1 = body1->getInvMass() + normalAxis.dot(vec);
00601                 }
00602                 btScalar denom = relaxation/(denom0+denom1);
00603                 solverConstraint.m_jacDiagABInv = denom;
00604         }
00605 
00606         {
00607 
00608 
00609                 btScalar rel_vel;
00610                 btScalar vel1Dotn = solverConstraint.m_contactNormal1.dot(body0?solverBodyA.m_linearVelocity+solverBodyA.m_externalForceImpulse:btVector3(0,0,0))
00611                         + solverConstraint.m_relpos1CrossNormal.dot(body0?solverBodyA.m_angularVelocity:btVector3(0,0,0));
00612                 btScalar vel2Dotn = solverConstraint.m_contactNormal2.dot(body1?solverBodyB.m_linearVelocity+solverBodyB.m_externalForceImpulse:btVector3(0,0,0))
00613                         + solverConstraint.m_relpos2CrossNormal.dot(body1?solverBodyB.m_angularVelocity:btVector3(0,0,0));
00614 
00615                 rel_vel = vel1Dotn+vel2Dotn;
00616 
00617 //              btScalar positionalError = 0.f;
00618 
00619                 btScalar velocityError =  desiredVelocity - rel_vel;
00620                 btScalar velocityImpulse = velocityError * solverConstraint.m_jacDiagABInv;
00621 
00622                 btScalar penetrationImpulse = btScalar(0);
00623 
00624                 if (cp.m_contactPointFlags & BT_CONTACT_FLAG_FRICTION_ANCHOR)
00625                 {
00626                         btScalar distance = (cp.getPositionWorldOnA() - cp.getPositionWorldOnB()).dot(normalAxis);
00627                         btScalar positionalError = -distance * infoGlobal.m_frictionERP/infoGlobal.m_timeStep;
00628                         penetrationImpulse = positionalError*solverConstraint.m_jacDiagABInv;
00629                 }
00630 
00631                 solverConstraint.m_rhs = penetrationImpulse + velocityImpulse;
00632                 solverConstraint.m_rhsPenetration = 0.f;
00633                 solverConstraint.m_cfm = cfmSlip;
00634                 solverConstraint.m_lowerLimit = -solverConstraint.m_friction;
00635                 solverConstraint.m_upperLimit = solverConstraint.m_friction;
00636 
00637         }
00638 }
00639 
00640 btSolverConstraint&     btSequentialImpulseConstraintSolver::addFrictionConstraint(const btVector3& normalAxis,int solverBodyIdA,int solverBodyIdB,int frictionIndex,btManifoldPoint& cp,const btVector3& rel_pos1,const btVector3& rel_pos2,btCollisionObject* colObj0,btCollisionObject* colObj1, btScalar relaxation, const btContactSolverInfo& infoGlobal, btScalar desiredVelocity, btScalar cfmSlip)
00641 {
00642         btSolverConstraint& solverConstraint = m_tmpSolverContactFrictionConstraintPool.expandNonInitializing();
00643         solverConstraint.m_frictionIndex = frictionIndex;
00644         setupFrictionConstraint(solverConstraint, normalAxis, solverBodyIdA, solverBodyIdB, cp, rel_pos1, rel_pos2,
00645                                                         colObj0, colObj1, relaxation, infoGlobal, desiredVelocity, cfmSlip);
00646         return solverConstraint;
00647 }
00648 
00649 
00650 void btSequentialImpulseConstraintSolver::setupTorsionalFrictionConstraint(     btSolverConstraint& solverConstraint, const btVector3& normalAxis1,int solverBodyIdA,int  solverBodyIdB,
00651                                                                         btManifoldPoint& cp,btScalar combinedTorsionalFriction, const btVector3& rel_pos1,const btVector3& rel_pos2,
00652                                                                         btCollisionObject* colObj0,btCollisionObject* colObj1, btScalar relaxation,
00653                                                                         btScalar desiredVelocity, btScalar cfmSlip)
00654 
00655 {
00656         btVector3 normalAxis(0,0,0);
00657 
00658 
00659         solverConstraint.m_contactNormal1 = normalAxis;
00660         solverConstraint.m_contactNormal2 = -normalAxis;
00661         btSolverBody& solverBodyA = m_tmpSolverBodyPool[solverBodyIdA];
00662         btSolverBody& solverBodyB = m_tmpSolverBodyPool[solverBodyIdB];
00663 
00664         btRigidBody* body0 = m_tmpSolverBodyPool[solverBodyIdA].m_originalBody;
00665         btRigidBody* body1 = m_tmpSolverBodyPool[solverBodyIdB].m_originalBody;
00666 
00667         solverConstraint.m_solverBodyIdA = solverBodyIdA;
00668         solverConstraint.m_solverBodyIdB = solverBodyIdB;
00669 
00670     solverConstraint.m_friction = combinedTorsionalFriction;
00671     solverConstraint.m_originalContactPoint = 0;
00672 
00673         solverConstraint.m_appliedImpulse = 0.f;
00674         solverConstraint.m_appliedPushImpulse = 0.f;
00675 
00676         {
00677                 btVector3 ftorqueAxis1 = -normalAxis1;
00678                 solverConstraint.m_relpos1CrossNormal = ftorqueAxis1;
00679                 solverConstraint.m_angularComponentA = body0 ? body0->getInvInertiaTensorWorld()*ftorqueAxis1*body0->getAngularFactor() : btVector3(0,0,0);
00680         }
00681         {
00682                 btVector3 ftorqueAxis1 = normalAxis1;
00683                 solverConstraint.m_relpos2CrossNormal = ftorqueAxis1;
00684                 solverConstraint.m_angularComponentB = body1 ? body1->getInvInertiaTensorWorld()*ftorqueAxis1*body1->getAngularFactor() : btVector3(0,0,0);
00685         }
00686 
00687 
00688         {
00689                 btVector3 iMJaA = body0?body0->getInvInertiaTensorWorld()*solverConstraint.m_relpos1CrossNormal:btVector3(0,0,0);
00690                 btVector3 iMJaB = body1?body1->getInvInertiaTensorWorld()*solverConstraint.m_relpos2CrossNormal:btVector3(0,0,0);
00691                 btScalar sum = 0;
00692                 sum += iMJaA.dot(solverConstraint.m_relpos1CrossNormal);
00693                 sum += iMJaB.dot(solverConstraint.m_relpos2CrossNormal);
00694                 solverConstraint.m_jacDiagABInv = btScalar(1.)/sum;
00695         }
00696 
00697         {
00698 
00699 
00700                 btScalar rel_vel;
00701                 btScalar vel1Dotn = solverConstraint.m_contactNormal1.dot(body0?solverBodyA.m_linearVelocity+solverBodyA.m_externalForceImpulse:btVector3(0,0,0))
00702                         + solverConstraint.m_relpos1CrossNormal.dot(body0?solverBodyA.m_angularVelocity:btVector3(0,0,0));
00703                 btScalar vel2Dotn = solverConstraint.m_contactNormal2.dot(body1?solverBodyB.m_linearVelocity+solverBodyB.m_externalForceImpulse:btVector3(0,0,0))
00704                         + solverConstraint.m_relpos2CrossNormal.dot(body1?solverBodyB.m_angularVelocity:btVector3(0,0,0));
00705 
00706                 rel_vel = vel1Dotn+vel2Dotn;
00707 
00708 //              btScalar positionalError = 0.f;
00709 
00710                 btSimdScalar velocityError =  desiredVelocity - rel_vel;
00711                 btSimdScalar    velocityImpulse = velocityError * btSimdScalar(solverConstraint.m_jacDiagABInv);
00712                 solverConstraint.m_rhs = velocityImpulse;
00713                 solverConstraint.m_cfm = cfmSlip;
00714                 solverConstraint.m_lowerLimit = -solverConstraint.m_friction;
00715                 solverConstraint.m_upperLimit = solverConstraint.m_friction;
00716 
00717         }
00718 }
00719 
00720 
00721 
00722 
00723 
00724 
00725 
00726 
00727 btSolverConstraint&     btSequentialImpulseConstraintSolver::addTorsionalFrictionConstraint(const btVector3& normalAxis,int solverBodyIdA,int solverBodyIdB,int frictionIndex,btManifoldPoint& cp,btScalar combinedTorsionalFriction, const btVector3& rel_pos1,const btVector3& rel_pos2,btCollisionObject* colObj0,btCollisionObject* colObj1, btScalar relaxation, btScalar desiredVelocity, btScalar cfmSlip)
00728 {
00729         btSolverConstraint& solverConstraint = m_tmpSolverContactRollingFrictionConstraintPool.expandNonInitializing();
00730         solverConstraint.m_frictionIndex = frictionIndex;
00731         setupTorsionalFrictionConstraint(solverConstraint, normalAxis, solverBodyIdA, solverBodyIdB, cp, combinedTorsionalFriction,rel_pos1, rel_pos2,
00732                                                         colObj0, colObj1, relaxation, desiredVelocity, cfmSlip);
00733         return solverConstraint;
00734 }
00735 
00736 
00737 int     btSequentialImpulseConstraintSolver::getOrInitSolverBody(btCollisionObject& body,btScalar timeStep)
00738 {
00739 #if BT_THREADSAFE
00740     int solverBodyId = -1;
00741     if ( !body.isStaticOrKinematicObject() )
00742     {
00743         // dynamic body
00744         // Dynamic bodies can only be in one island, so it's safe to write to the companionId
00745         solverBodyId = body.getCompanionId();
00746         if ( solverBodyId < 0 )
00747         {
00748             if ( btRigidBody* rb = btRigidBody::upcast( &body ) )
00749             {
00750                 solverBodyId = m_tmpSolverBodyPool.size();
00751                 btSolverBody& solverBody = m_tmpSolverBodyPool.expand();
00752                 initSolverBody( &solverBody, &body, timeStep );
00753                 body.setCompanionId( solverBodyId );
00754             }
00755         }
00756     }
00757     else if (body.isKinematicObject())
00758     {
00759         //
00760         // NOTE: must test for kinematic before static because some kinematic objects also
00761         //   identify as "static"
00762         //
00763         // Kinematic bodies can be in multiple islands at once, so it is a
00764         // race condition to write to them, so we use an alternate method
00765         // to record the solverBodyId
00766         int uniqueId = body.getWorldArrayIndex();
00767         const int INVALID_SOLVER_BODY_ID = -1;
00768         if (uniqueId >= m_kinematicBodyUniqueIdToSolverBodyTable.size())
00769         {
00770             m_kinematicBodyUniqueIdToSolverBodyTable.resize(uniqueId + 1, INVALID_SOLVER_BODY_ID);
00771         }
00772         solverBodyId = m_kinematicBodyUniqueIdToSolverBodyTable[ uniqueId ];
00773         // if no table entry yet,
00774         if ( solverBodyId == INVALID_SOLVER_BODY_ID )
00775         {
00776             // create a table entry for this body
00777             btRigidBody* rb = btRigidBody::upcast( &body );
00778             solverBodyId = m_tmpSolverBodyPool.size();
00779             btSolverBody& solverBody = m_tmpSolverBodyPool.expand();
00780             initSolverBody( &solverBody, &body, timeStep );
00781             m_kinematicBodyUniqueIdToSolverBodyTable[ uniqueId ] = solverBodyId;
00782         }
00783     }
00784     else
00785     {
00786         // all fixed bodies (inf mass) get mapped to a single solver id
00787         if ( m_fixedBodyId < 0 )
00788         {
00789             m_fixedBodyId = m_tmpSolverBodyPool.size();
00790             btSolverBody& fixedBody = m_tmpSolverBodyPool.expand();
00791             initSolverBody( &fixedBody, 0, timeStep );
00792         }
00793         solverBodyId = m_fixedBodyId;
00794     }
00795     btAssert( solverBodyId < m_tmpSolverBodyPool.size() );
00796         return solverBodyId;
00797 #else // BT_THREADSAFE
00798 
00799     int solverBodyIdA = -1;
00800 
00801         if (body.getCompanionId() >= 0)
00802         {
00803                 //body has already been converted
00804                 solverBodyIdA = body.getCompanionId();
00805         btAssert(solverBodyIdA < m_tmpSolverBodyPool.size());
00806         } else
00807         {
00808                 btRigidBody* rb = btRigidBody::upcast(&body);
00809                 //convert both active and kinematic objects (for their velocity)
00810                 if (rb && (rb->getInvMass() || rb->isKinematicObject()))
00811                 {
00812                         solverBodyIdA = m_tmpSolverBodyPool.size();
00813                         btSolverBody& solverBody = m_tmpSolverBodyPool.expand();
00814                         initSolverBody(&solverBody,&body,timeStep);
00815                         body.setCompanionId(solverBodyIdA);
00816                 } else
00817                 {
00818 
00819                         if (m_fixedBodyId<0)
00820                         {
00821                                 m_fixedBodyId = m_tmpSolverBodyPool.size();
00822                                 btSolverBody& fixedBody = m_tmpSolverBodyPool.expand();
00823                                 initSolverBody(&fixedBody,0,timeStep);
00824                         }
00825                         return m_fixedBodyId;
00826 //                      return 0;//assume first one is a fixed solver body
00827                 }
00828         }
00829 
00830         return solverBodyIdA;
00831 #endif // BT_THREADSAFE
00832 
00833 }
00834 #include <stdio.h>
00835 
00836 
00837 void btSequentialImpulseConstraintSolver::setupContactConstraint(btSolverConstraint& solverConstraint,
00838                                                                                                                                  int solverBodyIdA, int solverBodyIdB,
00839                                                                                                                                  btManifoldPoint& cp, const btContactSolverInfo& infoGlobal,
00840                                                                                                                                  btScalar& relaxation,
00841                                                                                                                                  const btVector3& rel_pos1, const btVector3& rel_pos2)
00842 {
00843 
00844                 //      const btVector3& pos1 = cp.getPositionWorldOnA();
00845                 //      const btVector3& pos2 = cp.getPositionWorldOnB();
00846 
00847                         btSolverBody* bodyA = &m_tmpSolverBodyPool[solverBodyIdA];
00848                         btSolverBody* bodyB = &m_tmpSolverBodyPool[solverBodyIdB];
00849 
00850                         btRigidBody* rb0 = bodyA->m_originalBody;
00851                         btRigidBody* rb1 = bodyB->m_originalBody;
00852 
00853 //                      btVector3 rel_pos1 = pos1 - colObj0->getWorldTransform().getOrigin();
00854 //                      btVector3 rel_pos2 = pos2 - colObj1->getWorldTransform().getOrigin();
00855                         //rel_pos1 = pos1 - bodyA->getWorldTransform().getOrigin();
00856                         //rel_pos2 = pos2 - bodyB->getWorldTransform().getOrigin();
00857 
00858                         relaxation = infoGlobal.m_sor;
00859                         btScalar invTimeStep = btScalar(1)/infoGlobal.m_timeStep;
00860 
00861             //cfm = 1 /       ( dt * kp + kd )
00862             //erp = dt * kp / ( dt * kp + kd )
00863             
00864             btScalar cfm = infoGlobal.m_globalCfm;
00865             btScalar erp = infoGlobal.m_erp2;
00866 
00867             if ((cp.m_contactPointFlags&BT_CONTACT_FLAG_HAS_CONTACT_CFM) || (cp.m_contactPointFlags&BT_CONTACT_FLAG_HAS_CONTACT_ERP))
00868             {
00869                 if (cp.m_contactPointFlags&BT_CONTACT_FLAG_HAS_CONTACT_CFM)
00870                     cfm  = cp.m_contactCFM;
00871                 if (cp.m_contactPointFlags&BT_CONTACT_FLAG_HAS_CONTACT_ERP)
00872                     erp = cp.m_contactERP;                
00873             } else
00874             {
00875                 if (cp.m_contactPointFlags & BT_CONTACT_FLAG_CONTACT_STIFFNESS_DAMPING)
00876                 {
00877                     btScalar denom = ( infoGlobal.m_timeStep * cp.m_combinedContactStiffness1 + cp.m_combinedContactDamping1 );
00878                     if (denom < SIMD_EPSILON)
00879                     {
00880                         denom = SIMD_EPSILON;
00881                     }
00882                     cfm = btScalar(1) / denom; 
00883                     erp = (infoGlobal.m_timeStep * cp.m_combinedContactStiffness1) / denom;
00884                 }
00885             }
00886             
00887             cfm *= invTimeStep;
00888             
00889 
00890                         btVector3 torqueAxis0 = rel_pos1.cross(cp.m_normalWorldOnB);
00891                         solverConstraint.m_angularComponentA = rb0 ? rb0->getInvInertiaTensorWorld()*torqueAxis0*rb0->getAngularFactor() : btVector3(0,0,0);
00892                         btVector3 torqueAxis1 = rel_pos2.cross(cp.m_normalWorldOnB);
00893                         solverConstraint.m_angularComponentB = rb1 ? rb1->getInvInertiaTensorWorld()*-torqueAxis1*rb1->getAngularFactor() : btVector3(0,0,0);
00894 
00895                                 {
00896 #ifdef COMPUTE_IMPULSE_DENOM
00897                                         btScalar denom0 = rb0->computeImpulseDenominator(pos1,cp.m_normalWorldOnB);
00898                                         btScalar denom1 = rb1->computeImpulseDenominator(pos2,cp.m_normalWorldOnB);
00899 #else
00900                                         btVector3 vec;
00901                                         btScalar denom0 = 0.f;
00902                                         btScalar denom1 = 0.f;
00903                                         if (rb0)
00904                                         {
00905                                                 vec = ( solverConstraint.m_angularComponentA).cross(rel_pos1);
00906                                                 denom0 = rb0->getInvMass() + cp.m_normalWorldOnB.dot(vec);
00907                                         }
00908                                         if (rb1)
00909                                         {
00910                                                 vec = ( -solverConstraint.m_angularComponentB).cross(rel_pos2);
00911                                                 denom1 = rb1->getInvMass() + cp.m_normalWorldOnB.dot(vec);
00912                                         }
00913 #endif //COMPUTE_IMPULSE_DENOM
00914 
00915                                         btScalar denom = relaxation/(denom0+denom1+cfm);
00916                                         solverConstraint.m_jacDiagABInv = denom;
00917                                 }
00918 
00919                                 if (rb0)
00920                                 {
00921                                         solverConstraint.m_contactNormal1 = cp.m_normalWorldOnB;
00922                                         solverConstraint.m_relpos1CrossNormal = torqueAxis0;
00923                                 } else
00924                                 {
00925                                         solverConstraint.m_contactNormal1.setZero();
00926                                         solverConstraint.m_relpos1CrossNormal.setZero();
00927                                 }
00928                                 if (rb1)
00929                                 {
00930                                         solverConstraint.m_contactNormal2 = -cp.m_normalWorldOnB;
00931                                         solverConstraint.m_relpos2CrossNormal = -torqueAxis1;
00932                                 }else
00933                                 {
00934                                         solverConstraint.m_contactNormal2.setZero();
00935                                         solverConstraint.m_relpos2CrossNormal.setZero();
00936                                 }
00937 
00938                                 btScalar restitution = 0.f;
00939                                 btScalar penetration = cp.getDistance()+infoGlobal.m_linearSlop;
00940 
00941                                 {
00942                                         btVector3 vel1,vel2;
00943 
00944                                         vel1 = rb0? rb0->getVelocityInLocalPoint(rel_pos1) : btVector3(0,0,0);
00945                                         vel2 = rb1? rb1->getVelocityInLocalPoint(rel_pos2) : btVector3(0,0,0);
00946 
00947         //                      btVector3 vel2 = rb1 ? rb1->getVelocityInLocalPoint(rel_pos2) : btVector3(0,0,0);
00948                                         btVector3 vel  = vel1 - vel2;
00949                                         btScalar rel_vel = cp.m_normalWorldOnB.dot(vel);
00950 
00951 
00952 
00953                                         solverConstraint.m_friction = cp.m_combinedFriction;
00954 
00955 
00956                                         restitution =  restitutionCurve(rel_vel, cp.m_combinedRestitution, infoGlobal.m_restitutionVelocityThreshold);
00957                                         if (restitution <= btScalar(0.))
00958                                         {
00959                                                 restitution = 0.f;
00960                                         };
00961                                 }
00962 
00963 
00965                                 if (infoGlobal.m_solverMode & SOLVER_USE_WARMSTARTING)
00966                                 {
00967                                         solverConstraint.m_appliedImpulse = cp.m_appliedImpulse * infoGlobal.m_warmstartingFactor;
00968                                         if (rb0)
00969                                                 bodyA->internalApplyImpulse(solverConstraint.m_contactNormal1*bodyA->internalGetInvMass()*rb0->getLinearFactor(),solverConstraint.m_angularComponentA,solverConstraint.m_appliedImpulse);
00970                                         if (rb1)
00971                                                 bodyB->internalApplyImpulse(-solverConstraint.m_contactNormal2*bodyB->internalGetInvMass()*rb1->getLinearFactor(),-solverConstraint.m_angularComponentB,-(btScalar)solverConstraint.m_appliedImpulse);
00972                                 } else
00973                                 {
00974                                         solverConstraint.m_appliedImpulse = 0.f;
00975                                 }
00976 
00977                                 solverConstraint.m_appliedPushImpulse = 0.f;
00978 
00979                                 {
00980 
00981                                         btVector3 externalForceImpulseA = bodyA->m_originalBody ? bodyA->m_externalForceImpulse: btVector3(0,0,0);
00982                                         btVector3 externalTorqueImpulseA = bodyA->m_originalBody ? bodyA->m_externalTorqueImpulse: btVector3(0,0,0);
00983                                         btVector3 externalForceImpulseB = bodyB->m_originalBody ? bodyB->m_externalForceImpulse: btVector3(0,0,0);
00984                                         btVector3 externalTorqueImpulseB = bodyB->m_originalBody ?bodyB->m_externalTorqueImpulse : btVector3(0,0,0);
00985 
00986 
00987                                         btScalar vel1Dotn = solverConstraint.m_contactNormal1.dot(bodyA->m_linearVelocity+externalForceImpulseA)
00988                                                 + solverConstraint.m_relpos1CrossNormal.dot(bodyA->m_angularVelocity+externalTorqueImpulseA);
00989                                         btScalar vel2Dotn = solverConstraint.m_contactNormal2.dot(bodyB->m_linearVelocity+externalForceImpulseB)
00990                                                 + solverConstraint.m_relpos2CrossNormal.dot(bodyB->m_angularVelocity+externalTorqueImpulseB);
00991                                         btScalar rel_vel = vel1Dotn+vel2Dotn;
00992 
00993                                         btScalar positionalError = 0.f;
00994                                         btScalar        velocityError = restitution - rel_vel;// * damping;
00995 
00996 
00997                                 
00998                                         if (penetration>0)
00999                                         {
01000                                                 positionalError = 0;
01001 
01002                                                 velocityError -= penetration *invTimeStep;
01003                                         } else
01004                                         {
01005                                                 positionalError = -penetration * erp*invTimeStep;
01006 
01007                                         }
01008 
01009                                         btScalar  penetrationImpulse = positionalError*solverConstraint.m_jacDiagABInv;
01010                                         btScalar velocityImpulse = velocityError *solverConstraint.m_jacDiagABInv;
01011 
01012                                         if (!infoGlobal.m_splitImpulse || (penetration > infoGlobal.m_splitImpulsePenetrationThreshold))
01013                                         {
01014                                                 //combine position and velocity into rhs
01015                                                 solverConstraint.m_rhs = penetrationImpulse+velocityImpulse;//-solverConstraint.m_contactNormal1.dot(bodyA->m_externalForce*bodyA->m_invMass-bodyB->m_externalForce/bodyB->m_invMass)*solverConstraint.m_jacDiagABInv;
01016                                                 solverConstraint.m_rhsPenetration = 0.f;
01017 
01018                                         } else
01019                                         {
01020                                                 //split position and velocity into rhs and m_rhsPenetration
01021                                                 solverConstraint.m_rhs = velocityImpulse;
01022                                                 solverConstraint.m_rhsPenetration = penetrationImpulse;
01023                                         }
01024                                         solverConstraint.m_cfm = cfm*solverConstraint.m_jacDiagABInv;
01025                                         solverConstraint.m_lowerLimit = 0;
01026                                         solverConstraint.m_upperLimit = 1e10f;
01027                                 }
01028 
01029 
01030 
01031 
01032 }
01033 
01034 
01035 
01036 void btSequentialImpulseConstraintSolver::setFrictionConstraintImpulse( btSolverConstraint& solverConstraint,
01037                                                                                                                                                 int solverBodyIdA, int solverBodyIdB,
01038                                                                                                                                  btManifoldPoint& cp, const btContactSolverInfo& infoGlobal)
01039 {
01040 
01041         btSolverBody* bodyA = &m_tmpSolverBodyPool[solverBodyIdA];
01042         btSolverBody* bodyB = &m_tmpSolverBodyPool[solverBodyIdB];
01043 
01044         btRigidBody* rb0 = bodyA->m_originalBody;
01045         btRigidBody* rb1 = bodyB->m_originalBody;
01046 
01047         {
01048                 btSolverConstraint& frictionConstraint1 = m_tmpSolverContactFrictionConstraintPool[solverConstraint.m_frictionIndex];
01049                 if (infoGlobal.m_solverMode & SOLVER_USE_WARMSTARTING)
01050                 {
01051                         frictionConstraint1.m_appliedImpulse = cp.m_appliedImpulseLateral1 * infoGlobal.m_warmstartingFactor;
01052                         if (rb0)
01053                                 bodyA->internalApplyImpulse(frictionConstraint1.m_contactNormal1*rb0->getInvMass()*rb0->getLinearFactor(),frictionConstraint1.m_angularComponentA,frictionConstraint1.m_appliedImpulse);
01054                         if (rb1)
01055                                 bodyB->internalApplyImpulse(-frictionConstraint1.m_contactNormal2*rb1->getInvMass()*rb1->getLinearFactor(),-frictionConstraint1.m_angularComponentB,-(btScalar)frictionConstraint1.m_appliedImpulse);
01056                 } else
01057                 {
01058                         frictionConstraint1.m_appliedImpulse = 0.f;
01059                 }
01060         }
01061 
01062         if ((infoGlobal.m_solverMode & SOLVER_USE_2_FRICTION_DIRECTIONS))
01063         {
01064                 btSolverConstraint& frictionConstraint2 = m_tmpSolverContactFrictionConstraintPool[solverConstraint.m_frictionIndex+1];
01065                 if (infoGlobal.m_solverMode & SOLVER_USE_WARMSTARTING)
01066                 {
01067                         frictionConstraint2.m_appliedImpulse = cp.m_appliedImpulseLateral2  * infoGlobal.m_warmstartingFactor;
01068                         if (rb0)
01069                                 bodyA->internalApplyImpulse(frictionConstraint2.m_contactNormal1*rb0->getInvMass(),frictionConstraint2.m_angularComponentA,frictionConstraint2.m_appliedImpulse);
01070                         if (rb1)
01071                                 bodyB->internalApplyImpulse(-frictionConstraint2.m_contactNormal2*rb1->getInvMass(),-frictionConstraint2.m_angularComponentB,-(btScalar)frictionConstraint2.m_appliedImpulse);
01072                 } else
01073                 {
01074                         frictionConstraint2.m_appliedImpulse = 0.f;
01075                 }
01076         }
01077 }
01078 
01079 
01080 
01081 
01082 void    btSequentialImpulseConstraintSolver::convertContact(btPersistentManifold* manifold,const btContactSolverInfo& infoGlobal)
01083 {
01084         btCollisionObject* colObj0=0,*colObj1=0;
01085 
01086         colObj0 = (btCollisionObject*)manifold->getBody0();
01087         colObj1 = (btCollisionObject*)manifold->getBody1();
01088 
01089         int solverBodyIdA = getOrInitSolverBody(*colObj0,infoGlobal.m_timeStep);
01090         int solverBodyIdB = getOrInitSolverBody(*colObj1,infoGlobal.m_timeStep);
01091 
01092 //      btRigidBody* bodyA = btRigidBody::upcast(colObj0);
01093 //      btRigidBody* bodyB = btRigidBody::upcast(colObj1);
01094 
01095         btSolverBody* solverBodyA = &m_tmpSolverBodyPool[solverBodyIdA];
01096         btSolverBody* solverBodyB = &m_tmpSolverBodyPool[solverBodyIdB];
01097 
01098 
01099 
01101         if (!solverBodyA || (solverBodyA->m_invMass.fuzzyZero() && (!solverBodyB || solverBodyB->m_invMass.fuzzyZero())))
01102                 return;
01103 
01104         int rollingFriction=1;
01105         for (int j=0;j<manifold->getNumContacts();j++)
01106         {
01107 
01108                 btManifoldPoint& cp = manifold->getContactPoint(j);
01109 
01110                 if (cp.getDistance() <= manifold->getContactProcessingThreshold())
01111                 {
01112                         btVector3 rel_pos1;
01113                         btVector3 rel_pos2;
01114                         btScalar relaxation;
01115 
01116 
01117                         int frictionIndex = m_tmpSolverContactConstraintPool.size();
01118                         btSolverConstraint& solverConstraint = m_tmpSolverContactConstraintPool.expandNonInitializing();
01119                         solverConstraint.m_solverBodyIdA = solverBodyIdA;
01120                         solverConstraint.m_solverBodyIdB = solverBodyIdB;
01121 
01122                         solverConstraint.m_originalContactPoint = &cp;
01123 
01124                         const btVector3& pos1 = cp.getPositionWorldOnA();
01125                         const btVector3& pos2 = cp.getPositionWorldOnB();
01126 
01127                         rel_pos1 = pos1 - colObj0->getWorldTransform().getOrigin();
01128                         rel_pos2 = pos2 - colObj1->getWorldTransform().getOrigin();
01129 
01130                         btVector3 vel1;
01131                         btVector3 vel2;
01132                         
01133                         solverBodyA->getVelocityInLocalPointNoDelta(rel_pos1,vel1);
01134                         solverBodyB->getVelocityInLocalPointNoDelta(rel_pos2,vel2 );
01135 
01136                         btVector3 vel  = vel1 - vel2;
01137                         btScalar rel_vel = cp.m_normalWorldOnB.dot(vel);
01138 
01139                         setupContactConstraint(solverConstraint, solverBodyIdA, solverBodyIdB, cp, infoGlobal, relaxation, rel_pos1, rel_pos2);
01140 
01141 
01142 
01143 
01145 
01146                         solverConstraint.m_frictionIndex = m_tmpSolverContactFrictionConstraintPool.size();
01147 
01148                         if ((cp.m_combinedRollingFriction>0.f) && (rollingFriction>0))
01149                         {
01150                
01151                                 {
01152                                         addTorsionalFrictionConstraint(cp.m_normalWorldOnB,solverBodyIdA,solverBodyIdB,frictionIndex,cp,cp.m_combinedSpinningFriction, rel_pos1,rel_pos2,colObj0,colObj1, relaxation);
01153                                         btVector3 axis0,axis1;
01154                                         btPlaneSpace1(cp.m_normalWorldOnB,axis0,axis1);
01155                                         axis0.normalize();
01156                                         axis1.normalize();
01157                                         
01158                                         applyAnisotropicFriction(colObj0,axis0,btCollisionObject::CF_ANISOTROPIC_ROLLING_FRICTION);
01159                                         applyAnisotropicFriction(colObj1,axis0,btCollisionObject::CF_ANISOTROPIC_ROLLING_FRICTION);
01160                                         applyAnisotropicFriction(colObj0,axis1,btCollisionObject::CF_ANISOTROPIC_ROLLING_FRICTION);
01161                                         applyAnisotropicFriction(colObj1,axis1,btCollisionObject::CF_ANISOTROPIC_ROLLING_FRICTION);
01162                                         if (axis0.length()>0.001)
01163                                                 addTorsionalFrictionConstraint(axis0,solverBodyIdA,solverBodyIdB,frictionIndex,cp,
01164                                                        cp.m_combinedRollingFriction, rel_pos1,rel_pos2,colObj0,colObj1, relaxation);
01165                                         if (axis1.length()>0.001)
01166                                                 addTorsionalFrictionConstraint(axis1,solverBodyIdA,solverBodyIdB,frictionIndex,cp,
01167                                                        cp.m_combinedRollingFriction, rel_pos1,rel_pos2,colObj0,colObj1, relaxation);
01168 
01169                                 }
01170                         }
01171 
01176 
01187                 
01188                         if (!(infoGlobal.m_solverMode & SOLVER_ENABLE_FRICTION_DIRECTION_CACHING) || !(cp.m_contactPointFlags&BT_CONTACT_FLAG_LATERAL_FRICTION_INITIALIZED))
01189                         {
01190                                 cp.m_lateralFrictionDir1 = vel - cp.m_normalWorldOnB * rel_vel;
01191                                 btScalar lat_rel_vel = cp.m_lateralFrictionDir1.length2();
01192                                 if (!(infoGlobal.m_solverMode & SOLVER_DISABLE_VELOCITY_DEPENDENT_FRICTION_DIRECTION) && lat_rel_vel > SIMD_EPSILON)
01193                                 {
01194                                         cp.m_lateralFrictionDir1 *= 1.f/btSqrt(lat_rel_vel);
01195                                         applyAnisotropicFriction(colObj0,cp.m_lateralFrictionDir1,btCollisionObject::CF_ANISOTROPIC_FRICTION);
01196                                         applyAnisotropicFriction(colObj1,cp.m_lateralFrictionDir1,btCollisionObject::CF_ANISOTROPIC_FRICTION);
01197                                         addFrictionConstraint(cp.m_lateralFrictionDir1,solverBodyIdA,solverBodyIdB,frictionIndex,cp,rel_pos1,rel_pos2,colObj0,colObj1, relaxation,infoGlobal);
01198 
01199                                         if((infoGlobal.m_solverMode & SOLVER_USE_2_FRICTION_DIRECTIONS))
01200                                         {
01201                                                 cp.m_lateralFrictionDir2 = cp.m_lateralFrictionDir1.cross(cp.m_normalWorldOnB);
01202                                                 cp.m_lateralFrictionDir2.normalize();//??
01203                                                 applyAnisotropicFriction(colObj0,cp.m_lateralFrictionDir2,btCollisionObject::CF_ANISOTROPIC_FRICTION);
01204                                                 applyAnisotropicFriction(colObj1,cp.m_lateralFrictionDir2,btCollisionObject::CF_ANISOTROPIC_FRICTION);
01205                                                 addFrictionConstraint(cp.m_lateralFrictionDir2,solverBodyIdA,solverBodyIdB,frictionIndex,cp,rel_pos1,rel_pos2,colObj0,colObj1, relaxation, infoGlobal);
01206                                         }
01207 
01208                                 } else
01209                                 {
01210                                         btPlaneSpace1(cp.m_normalWorldOnB,cp.m_lateralFrictionDir1,cp.m_lateralFrictionDir2);
01211 
01212                                         applyAnisotropicFriction(colObj0,cp.m_lateralFrictionDir1,btCollisionObject::CF_ANISOTROPIC_FRICTION);
01213                                         applyAnisotropicFriction(colObj1,cp.m_lateralFrictionDir1,btCollisionObject::CF_ANISOTROPIC_FRICTION);
01214                                         addFrictionConstraint(cp.m_lateralFrictionDir1,solverBodyIdA,solverBodyIdB,frictionIndex,cp,rel_pos1,rel_pos2,colObj0,colObj1, relaxation, infoGlobal);
01215 
01216                                         if ((infoGlobal.m_solverMode & SOLVER_USE_2_FRICTION_DIRECTIONS))
01217                                         {
01218                                                 applyAnisotropicFriction(colObj0,cp.m_lateralFrictionDir2,btCollisionObject::CF_ANISOTROPIC_FRICTION);
01219                                                 applyAnisotropicFriction(colObj1,cp.m_lateralFrictionDir2,btCollisionObject::CF_ANISOTROPIC_FRICTION);
01220                                                 addFrictionConstraint(cp.m_lateralFrictionDir2,solverBodyIdA,solverBodyIdB,frictionIndex,cp,rel_pos1,rel_pos2,colObj0,colObj1, relaxation, infoGlobal);
01221                                         }
01222 
01223 
01224                                         if ((infoGlobal.m_solverMode & SOLVER_USE_2_FRICTION_DIRECTIONS) && (infoGlobal.m_solverMode & SOLVER_DISABLE_VELOCITY_DEPENDENT_FRICTION_DIRECTION))
01225                                         {
01226                                                 cp.m_contactPointFlags|=BT_CONTACT_FLAG_LATERAL_FRICTION_INITIALIZED;
01227                                         }
01228                                 }
01229 
01230                         } else
01231                         {
01232                                 addFrictionConstraint(cp.m_lateralFrictionDir1,solverBodyIdA,solverBodyIdB,frictionIndex,cp,rel_pos1,rel_pos2,colObj0,colObj1, relaxation, infoGlobal, cp.m_contactMotion1, cp.m_frictionCFM);
01233 
01234                                 if ((infoGlobal.m_solverMode & SOLVER_USE_2_FRICTION_DIRECTIONS))
01235                                         addFrictionConstraint(cp.m_lateralFrictionDir2,solverBodyIdA,solverBodyIdB,frictionIndex,cp,rel_pos1,rel_pos2,colObj0,colObj1, relaxation, infoGlobal, cp.m_contactMotion2, cp.m_frictionCFM);
01236 
01237                         }
01238                         setFrictionConstraintImpulse( solverConstraint, solverBodyIdA, solverBodyIdB, cp, infoGlobal);
01239 
01240 
01241 
01242 
01243                 }
01244         }
01245 }
01246 
01247 void btSequentialImpulseConstraintSolver::convertContacts(btPersistentManifold** manifoldPtr,int numManifolds, const btContactSolverInfo& infoGlobal)
01248 {
01249         int i;
01250         btPersistentManifold* manifold = 0;
01251 //                      btCollisionObject* colObj0=0,*colObj1=0;
01252 
01253 
01254         for (i=0;i<numManifolds;i++)
01255         {
01256                 manifold = manifoldPtr[i];
01257                 convertContact(manifold,infoGlobal);
01258         }
01259 }
01260 
01261 btScalar btSequentialImpulseConstraintSolver::solveGroupCacheFriendlySetup(btCollisionObject** bodies, int numBodies, btPersistentManifold** manifoldPtr, int numManifolds,btTypedConstraint** constraints,int numConstraints,const btContactSolverInfo& infoGlobal,btIDebugDraw* debugDrawer)
01262 {
01263         m_fixedBodyId = -1;
01264         BT_PROFILE("solveGroupCacheFriendlySetup");
01265         (void)debugDrawer;
01266 
01267     // if solver mode has changed,
01268     if ( infoGlobal.m_solverMode != m_cachedSolverMode )
01269     {
01270         // update solver functions to use SIMD or non-SIMD
01271         bool useSimd = !!( infoGlobal.m_solverMode & SOLVER_SIMD );
01272         setupSolverFunctions( useSimd );
01273         m_cachedSolverMode = infoGlobal.m_solverMode;
01274     }
01275         m_maxOverrideNumSolverIterations = 0;
01276 
01277 #ifdef BT_ADDITIONAL_DEBUG
01278          //make sure that dynamic bodies exist for all (enabled) constraints
01279         for (int i=0;i<numConstraints;i++)
01280         {
01281                 btTypedConstraint* constraint = constraints[i];
01282                 if (constraint->isEnabled())
01283                 {
01284                         if (!constraint->getRigidBodyA().isStaticOrKinematicObject())
01285                         {
01286                                 bool found=false;
01287                                 for (int b=0;b<numBodies;b++)
01288                                 {
01289 
01290                                         if (&constraint->getRigidBodyA()==bodies[b])
01291                                         {
01292                                                 found = true;
01293                                                 break;
01294                                         }
01295                                 }
01296                                 btAssert(found);
01297                         }
01298                         if (!constraint->getRigidBodyB().isStaticOrKinematicObject())
01299                         {
01300                                 bool found=false;
01301                                 for (int b=0;b<numBodies;b++)
01302                                 {
01303                                         if (&constraint->getRigidBodyB()==bodies[b])
01304                                         {
01305                                                 found = true;
01306                                                 break;
01307                                         }
01308                                 }
01309                                 btAssert(found);
01310                         }
01311                 }
01312         }
01313     //make sure that dynamic bodies exist for all contact manifolds
01314     for (int i=0;i<numManifolds;i++)
01315     {
01316         if (!manifoldPtr[i]->getBody0()->isStaticOrKinematicObject())
01317         {
01318             bool found=false;
01319             for (int b=0;b<numBodies;b++)
01320             {
01321 
01322                 if (manifoldPtr[i]->getBody0()==bodies[b])
01323                 {
01324                     found = true;
01325                     break;
01326                 }
01327             }
01328             btAssert(found);
01329         }
01330         if (!manifoldPtr[i]->getBody1()->isStaticOrKinematicObject())
01331         {
01332             bool found=false;
01333             for (int b=0;b<numBodies;b++)
01334             {
01335                 if (manifoldPtr[i]->getBody1()==bodies[b])
01336                 {
01337                     found = true;
01338                     break;
01339                 }
01340             }
01341             btAssert(found);
01342         }
01343     }
01344 #endif //BT_ADDITIONAL_DEBUG
01345 
01346 
01347         for (int i = 0; i < numBodies; i++)
01348         {
01349                 bodies[i]->setCompanionId(-1);
01350         }
01351 #if BT_THREADSAFE
01352     m_kinematicBodyUniqueIdToSolverBodyTable.resize( 0 );
01353 #endif // BT_THREADSAFE
01354 
01355         m_tmpSolverBodyPool.reserve(numBodies+1);
01356         m_tmpSolverBodyPool.resize(0);
01357 
01358         //btSolverBody& fixedBody = m_tmpSolverBodyPool.expand();
01359     //initSolverBody(&fixedBody,0);
01360 
01361         //convert all bodies
01362 
01363 
01364         for (int i=0;i<numBodies;i++)
01365         {
01366                 int bodyId = getOrInitSolverBody(*bodies[i],infoGlobal.m_timeStep);
01367 
01368                 btRigidBody* body = btRigidBody::upcast(bodies[i]);
01369                 if (body && body->getInvMass())
01370                 {
01371                         btSolverBody& solverBody = m_tmpSolverBodyPool[bodyId];
01372                         btVector3 gyroForce (0,0,0);
01373                         if (body->getFlags()&BT_ENABLE_GYROSCOPIC_FORCE_EXPLICIT)
01374                         {
01375                                 gyroForce = body->computeGyroscopicForceExplicit(infoGlobal.m_maxGyroscopicForce);
01376                                 solverBody.m_externalTorqueImpulse -= gyroForce*body->getInvInertiaTensorWorld()*infoGlobal.m_timeStep;
01377                         }
01378                         if (body->getFlags()&BT_ENABLE_GYROSCOPIC_FORCE_IMPLICIT_WORLD)
01379                         {
01380                                 gyroForce = body->computeGyroscopicImpulseImplicit_World(infoGlobal.m_timeStep);
01381                                 solverBody.m_externalTorqueImpulse += gyroForce;
01382                         }
01383                         if (body->getFlags()&BT_ENABLE_GYROSCOPIC_FORCE_IMPLICIT_BODY)
01384                         {
01385                                 gyroForce = body->computeGyroscopicImpulseImplicit_Body(infoGlobal.m_timeStep);
01386                                 solverBody.m_externalTorqueImpulse += gyroForce;
01387 
01388                         }
01389                         
01390 
01391                 }
01392         }
01393 
01394         if (1)
01395         {
01396                 int j;
01397                 for (j=0;j<numConstraints;j++)
01398                 {
01399                         btTypedConstraint* constraint = constraints[j];
01400                         constraint->buildJacobian();
01401                         constraint->internalSetAppliedImpulse(0.0f);
01402                 }
01403         }
01404 
01405         //btRigidBody* rb0=0,*rb1=0;
01406 
01407         //if (1)
01408         {
01409                 {
01410 
01411                         int totalNumRows = 0;
01412                         int i;
01413 
01414                         m_tmpConstraintSizesPool.resizeNoInitialize(numConstraints);
01415                         //calculate the total number of contraint rows
01416                         for (i=0;i<numConstraints;i++)
01417                         {
01418                                 btTypedConstraint::btConstraintInfo1& info1 = m_tmpConstraintSizesPool[i];
01419                                 btJointFeedback* fb = constraints[i]->getJointFeedback();
01420                                 if (fb)
01421                                 {
01422                                         fb->m_appliedForceBodyA.setZero();
01423                                         fb->m_appliedTorqueBodyA.setZero();
01424                                         fb->m_appliedForceBodyB.setZero();
01425                                         fb->m_appliedTorqueBodyB.setZero();
01426                                 }
01427 
01428                                 if (constraints[i]->isEnabled())
01429                                 {
01430                                 }
01431                                 if (constraints[i]->isEnabled())
01432                                 {
01433                                         constraints[i]->getInfo1(&info1);
01434                                 } else
01435                                 {
01436                                         info1.m_numConstraintRows = 0;
01437                                         info1.nub = 0;
01438                                 }
01439                                 totalNumRows += info1.m_numConstraintRows;
01440                         }
01441                         m_tmpSolverNonContactConstraintPool.resizeNoInitialize(totalNumRows);
01442 
01443 
01445                         int currentRow = 0;
01446 
01447                         for (i=0;i<numConstraints;i++)
01448                         {
01449                                 const btTypedConstraint::btConstraintInfo1& info1 = m_tmpConstraintSizesPool[i];
01450 
01451                                 if (info1.m_numConstraintRows)
01452                                 {
01453                                         btAssert(currentRow<totalNumRows);
01454 
01455                                         btSolverConstraint* currentConstraintRow = &m_tmpSolverNonContactConstraintPool[currentRow];
01456                                         btTypedConstraint* constraint = constraints[i];
01457                                         btRigidBody& rbA = constraint->getRigidBodyA();
01458                                         btRigidBody& rbB = constraint->getRigidBodyB();
01459 
01460                                         int solverBodyIdA = getOrInitSolverBody(rbA,infoGlobal.m_timeStep);
01461                     int solverBodyIdB = getOrInitSolverBody(rbB,infoGlobal.m_timeStep);
01462 
01463                     btSolverBody* bodyAPtr = &m_tmpSolverBodyPool[solverBodyIdA];
01464                     btSolverBody* bodyBPtr = &m_tmpSolverBodyPool[solverBodyIdB];
01465 
01466 
01467 
01468
