01469                                         int overrideNumSolverIterations = constraint->getOverrideNumSolverIterations() > 0 ? constraint->getOverrideNumSolverIterations() : infoGlobal.m_numIterations;
01470                                         if (overrideNumSolverIterations>m_maxOverrideNumSolverIterations)
01471                                                 m_maxOverrideNumSolverIterations = overrideNumSolverIterations;
01472 
01473 
01474                                         int j;
01475                                         for ( j=0;j<info1.m_numConstraintRows;j++)
01476                                         {
01477                                                 memset(&currentConstraintRow[j],0,sizeof(btSolverConstraint));
01478                                                 currentConstraintRow[j].m_lowerLimit = -SIMD_INFINITY;
01479                                                 currentConstraintRow[j].m_upperLimit = SIMD_INFINITY;
01480                                                 currentConstraintRow[j].m_appliedImpulse = 0.f;
01481                                                 currentConstraintRow[j].m_appliedPushImpulse = 0.f;
01482                                                 currentConstraintRow[j].m_solverBodyIdA = solverBodyIdA;
01483                                                 currentConstraintRow[j].m_solverBodyIdB = solverBodyIdB;
01484                                                 currentConstraintRow[j].m_overrideNumSolverIterations = overrideNumSolverIterations;
01485                                         }
01486 
01487                                         bodyAPtr->internalGetDeltaLinearVelocity().setValue(0.f,0.f,0.f);
01488                                         bodyAPtr->internalGetDeltaAngularVelocity().setValue(0.f,0.f,0.f);
01489                                         bodyAPtr->internalGetPushVelocity().setValue(0.f,0.f,0.f);
01490                                         bodyAPtr->internalGetTurnVelocity().setValue(0.f,0.f,0.f);
01491                                         bodyBPtr->internalGetDeltaLinearVelocity().setValue(0.f,0.f,0.f);
01492                                         bodyBPtr->internalGetDeltaAngularVelocity().setValue(0.f,0.f,0.f);
01493                                         bodyBPtr->internalGetPushVelocity().setValue(0.f,0.f,0.f);
01494                                         bodyBPtr->internalGetTurnVelocity().setValue(0.f,0.f,0.f);
01495 
01496 
01497                                         btTypedConstraint::btConstraintInfo2 info2;
01498                                         info2.fps = 1.f/infoGlobal.m_timeStep;
01499                                         info2.erp = infoGlobal.m_erp;
01500                                         info2.m_J1linearAxis = currentConstraintRow->m_contactNormal1;
01501                                         info2.m_J1angularAxis = currentConstraintRow->m_relpos1CrossNormal;
01502                                         info2.m_J2linearAxis = currentConstraintRow->m_contactNormal2;
01503                                         info2.m_J2angularAxis = currentConstraintRow->m_relpos2CrossNormal;
01504                                         info2.rowskip = sizeof(btSolverConstraint)/sizeof(btScalar);//check this
01506                             btAssert(info2.rowskip*sizeof(btScalar)== sizeof(btSolverConstraint));
01507                                         info2.m_constraintError = &currentConstraintRow->m_rhs;
01508                                         currentConstraintRow->m_cfm = infoGlobal.m_globalCfm;
01509                                         info2.m_damping = infoGlobal.m_damping;
01510                                         info2.cfm = &currentConstraintRow->m_cfm;
01511                                         info2.m_lowerLimit = &currentConstraintRow->m_lowerLimit;
01512                                         info2.m_upperLimit = &currentConstraintRow->m_upperLimit;
01513                                         info2.m_numIterations = infoGlobal.m_numIterations;
01514                                         constraints[i]->getInfo2(&info2);
01515 
01517                                         for ( j=0;j<info1.m_numConstraintRows;j++)
01518                                         {
01519                                                 btSolverConstraint& solverConstraint = currentConstraintRow[j];
01520 
01521                                                 if (solverConstraint.m_upperLimit>=constraints[i]->getBreakingImpulseThreshold())
01522                                                 {
01523                                                         solverConstraint.m_upperLimit = constraints[i]->getBreakingImpulseThreshold();
01524                                                 }
01525 
01526                                                 if (solverConstraint.m_lowerLimit<=-constraints[i]->getBreakingImpulseThreshold())
01527                                                 {
01528                                                         solverConstraint.m_lowerLimit = -constraints[i]->getBreakingImpulseThreshold();
01529                                                 }
01530 
01531                                                 solverConstraint.m_originalContactPoint = constraint;
01532 
01533                                                 {
01534                                                         const btVector3& ftorqueAxis1 = solverConstraint.m_relpos1CrossNormal;
01535                                                         solverConstraint.m_angularComponentA = constraint->getRigidBodyA().getInvInertiaTensorWorld()*ftorqueAxis1*constraint->getRigidBodyA().getAngularFactor();
01536                                                 }
01537                                                 {
01538                                                         const btVector3& ftorqueAxis2 = solverConstraint.m_relpos2CrossNormal;
01539                                                         solverConstraint.m_angularComponentB = constraint->getRigidBodyB().getInvInertiaTensorWorld()*ftorqueAxis2*constraint->getRigidBodyB().getAngularFactor();
01540                                                 }
01541 
01542                                                 {
01543                                                         btVector3 iMJlA = solverConstraint.m_contactNormal1*rbA.getInvMass();
01544                                                         btVector3 iMJaA = rbA.getInvInertiaTensorWorld()*solverConstraint.m_relpos1CrossNormal;
01545                                                         btVector3 iMJlB = solverConstraint.m_contactNormal2*rbB.getInvMass();//sign of normal?
01546                                                         btVector3 iMJaB = rbB.getInvInertiaTensorWorld()*solverConstraint.m_relpos2CrossNormal;
01547 
01548                                                         btScalar sum = iMJlA.dot(solverConstraint.m_contactNormal1);
01549                                                         sum += iMJaA.dot(solverConstraint.m_relpos1CrossNormal);
01550                                                         sum += iMJlB.dot(solverConstraint.m_contactNormal2);
01551                                                         sum += iMJaB.dot(solverConstraint.m_relpos2CrossNormal);
01552                                                         btScalar fsum = btFabs(sum);
01553                                                         btAssert(fsum > SIMD_EPSILON);
01554                                                         btScalar sorRelaxation = 1.f;//todo: get from globalInfo?
01555                                                         solverConstraint.m_jacDiagABInv = fsum>SIMD_EPSILON?sorRelaxation/sum : 0.f;
01556                                                 }
01557 
01558 
01559 
01560                                                 {
01561                                                         btScalar rel_vel;
01562                                                         btVector3 externalForceImpulseA = bodyAPtr->m_originalBody ? bodyAPtr->m_externalForceImpulse : btVector3(0,0,0);
01563                                                         btVector3 externalTorqueImpulseA = bodyAPtr->m_originalBody ? bodyAPtr->m_externalTorqueImpulse : btVector3(0,0,0);
01564 
01565                                                         btVector3 externalForceImpulseB = bodyBPtr->m_originalBody ? bodyBPtr->m_externalForceImpulse : btVector3(0,0,0);
01566                                                         btVector3 externalTorqueImpulseB = bodyBPtr->m_originalBody ?bodyBPtr->m_externalTorqueImpulse : btVector3(0,0,0);
01567 
01568                                                         btScalar vel1Dotn = solverConstraint.m_contactNormal1.dot(rbA.getLinearVelocity()+externalForceImpulseA)
01569                                                                                                 + solverConstraint.m_relpos1CrossNormal.dot(rbA.getAngularVelocity()+externalTorqueImpulseA);
01570 
01571                                                         btScalar vel2Dotn = solverConstraint.m_contactNormal2.dot(rbB.getLinearVelocity()+externalForceImpulseB)
01572                                                                                                                                 + solverConstraint.m_relpos2CrossNormal.dot(rbB.getAngularVelocity()+externalTorqueImpulseB);
01573 
01574                                                         rel_vel = vel1Dotn+vel2Dotn;
01575                                                         btScalar restitution = 0.f;
01576                                                         btScalar positionalError = solverConstraint.m_rhs;//already filled in by getConstraintInfo2
01577                                                         btScalar        velocityError = restitution - rel_vel * info2.m_damping;
01578                                                         btScalar        penetrationImpulse = positionalError*solverConstraint.m_jacDiagABInv;
01579                                                         btScalar        velocityImpulse = velocityError *solverConstraint.m_jacDiagABInv;
01580                                                         solverConstraint.m_rhs = penetrationImpulse+velocityImpulse;
01581                                                         solverConstraint.m_appliedImpulse = 0.f;
01582 
01583 
01584                                                 }
01585                                         }
01586                                 }
01587                                 currentRow+=m_tmpConstraintSizesPool[i].m_numConstraintRows;
01588                         }
01589                 }
01590 
01591                 convertContacts(manifoldPtr,numManifolds,infoGlobal);
01592 
01593         }
01594 
01595 //      btContactSolverInfo info = infoGlobal;
01596 
01597 
01598         int numNonContactPool = m_tmpSolverNonContactConstraintPool.size();
01599         int numConstraintPool = m_tmpSolverContactConstraintPool.size();
01600         int numFrictionPool = m_tmpSolverContactFrictionConstraintPool.size();
01601 
01603         m_orderNonContactConstraintPool.resizeNoInitialize(numNonContactPool);
01604         if ((infoGlobal.m_solverMode & SOLVER_USE_2_FRICTION_DIRECTIONS))
01605                 m_orderTmpConstraintPool.resizeNoInitialize(numConstraintPool*2);
01606         else
01607                 m_orderTmpConstraintPool.resizeNoInitialize(numConstraintPool);
01608 
01609         m_orderFrictionConstraintPool.resizeNoInitialize(numFrictionPool);
01610         {
01611                 int i;
01612                 for (i=0;i<numNonContactPool;i++)
01613                 {
01614                         m_orderNonContactConstraintPool[i] = i;
01615                 }
01616                 for (i=0;i<numConstraintPool;i++)
01617                 {
01618                         m_orderTmpConstraintPool[i] = i;
01619                 }
01620                 for (i=0;i<numFrictionPool;i++)
01621                 {
01622                         m_orderFrictionConstraintPool[i] = i;
01623                 }
01624         }
01625 
01626         return 0.f;
01627 
01628 }
01629 
01630 
01631 btScalar btSequentialImpulseConstraintSolver::solveSingleIteration(int iteration, btCollisionObject** /*bodies */,int /*numBodies*/,btPersistentManifold** /*manifoldPtr*/, int /*numManifolds*/,btTypedConstraint** constraints,int numConstraints,const btContactSolverInfo& infoGlobal,btIDebugDraw* /*debugDrawer*/)
01632 {
01633         btScalar leastSquaresResidual = 0.f;
01634 
01635         int numNonContactPool = m_tmpSolverNonContactConstraintPool.size();
01636         int numConstraintPool = m_tmpSolverContactConstraintPool.size();
01637         int numFrictionPool = m_tmpSolverContactFrictionConstraintPool.size();
01638 
01639         if (infoGlobal.m_solverMode & SOLVER_RANDMIZE_ORDER)
01640         {
01641                 if (1)                  // uncomment this for a bit less random ((iteration & 7) == 0)
01642                 {
01643 
01644                         for (int j=0; j<numNonContactPool; ++j) {
01645                                 int tmp = m_orderNonContactConstraintPool[j];
01646                                 int swapi = btRandInt2(j+1);
01647                                 m_orderNonContactConstraintPool[j] = m_orderNonContactConstraintPool[swapi];
01648                                 m_orderNonContactConstraintPool[swapi] = tmp;
01649                         }
01650 
01651                         //contact/friction constraints are not solved more than
01652                         if (iteration< infoGlobal.m_numIterations)
01653                         {
01654                                 for (int j=0; j<numConstraintPool; ++j) {
01655                                         int tmp = m_orderTmpConstraintPool[j];
01656                                         int swapi = btRandInt2(j+1);
01657                                         m_orderTmpConstraintPool[j] = m_orderTmpConstraintPool[swapi];
01658                                         m_orderTmpConstraintPool[swapi] = tmp;
01659                                 }
01660 
01661                                 for (int j=0; j<numFrictionPool; ++j) {
01662                                         int tmp = m_orderFrictionConstraintPool[j];
01663                                         int swapi = btRandInt2(j+1);
01664                                         m_orderFrictionConstraintPool[j] = m_orderFrictionConstraintPool[swapi];
01665                                         m_orderFrictionConstraintPool[swapi] = tmp;
01666                                 }
01667                         }
01668                 }
01669         }
01670 
01672                 for (int j=0;j<m_tmpSolverNonContactConstraintPool.size();j++)
01673                 {
01674                         btSolverConstraint& constraint = m_tmpSolverNonContactConstraintPool[m_orderNonContactConstraintPool[j]];
01675                         if (iteration < constraint.m_overrideNumSolverIterations)
01676                         {
01677                                 btScalar residual = resolveSingleConstraintRowGeneric(m_tmpSolverBodyPool[constraint.m_solverBodyIdA],m_tmpSolverBodyPool[constraint.m_solverBodyIdB],constraint);
01678                                 leastSquaresResidual += residual*residual;
01679                         }
01680                 }
01681 
01682                 if (iteration< infoGlobal.m_numIterations)
01683                 {
01684                         for (int j=0;j<numConstraints;j++)
01685                         {
01686                                 if (constraints[j]->isEnabled())
01687                                 {
01688                                         int bodyAid = getOrInitSolverBody(constraints[j]->getRigidBodyA(),infoGlobal.m_timeStep);
01689                                         int bodyBid = getOrInitSolverBody(constraints[j]->getRigidBodyB(),infoGlobal.m_timeStep);
01690                                         btSolverBody& bodyA = m_tmpSolverBodyPool[bodyAid];
01691                                         btSolverBody& bodyB = m_tmpSolverBodyPool[bodyBid];
01692                                         constraints[j]->solveConstraintObsolete(bodyA,bodyB,infoGlobal.m_timeStep);
01693                                 }
01694                         }
01695 
01697                         if (infoGlobal.m_solverMode & SOLVER_INTERLEAVE_CONTACT_AND_FRICTION_CONSTRAINTS)
01698                         {
01699                                 int numPoolConstraints = m_tmpSolverContactConstraintPool.size();
01700                                 int multiplier = (infoGlobal.m_solverMode & SOLVER_USE_2_FRICTION_DIRECTIONS)? 2 : 1;
01701 
01702                                 for (int c=0;c<numPoolConstraints;c++)
01703                                 {
01704                                         btScalar totalImpulse =0;
01705 
01706                                         {
01707                                                 const btSolverConstraint& solveManifold = m_tmpSolverContactConstraintPool[m_orderTmpConstraintPool[c]];
01708                                                 btScalar residual = resolveSingleConstraintRowLowerLimit(m_tmpSolverBodyPool[solveManifold.m_solverBodyIdA],m_tmpSolverBodyPool[solveManifold.m_solverBodyIdB],solveManifold);
01709                                                 leastSquaresResidual += residual*residual;
01710 
01711                                                 totalImpulse = solveManifold.m_appliedImpulse;
01712                                         }
01713                                         bool applyFriction = true;
01714                                         if (applyFriction)
01715                                         {
01716                                                 {
01717 
01718                                                         btSolverConstraint& solveManifold = m_tmpSolverContactFrictionConstraintPool[m_orderFrictionConstraintPool[c*multiplier]];
01719 
01720                                                         if (totalImpulse>btScalar(0))
01721                                                         {
01722                                                                 solveManifold.m_lowerLimit = -(solveManifold.m_friction*totalImpulse);
01723                                                                 solveManifold.m_upperLimit = solveManifold.m_friction*totalImpulse;
01724 
01725                                                                 btScalar residual = resolveSingleConstraintRowGeneric(m_tmpSolverBodyPool[solveManifold.m_solverBodyIdA],m_tmpSolverBodyPool[solveManifold.m_solverBodyIdB],solveManifold);
01726                                                                 leastSquaresResidual += residual*residual;
01727                                                         }
01728                                                 }
01729 
01730                                                 if (infoGlobal.m_solverMode & SOLVER_USE_2_FRICTION_DIRECTIONS)
01731                                                 {
01732 
01733                                                         btSolverConstraint& solveManifold = m_tmpSolverContactFrictionConstraintPool[m_orderFrictionConstraintPool[c*multiplier+1]];
01734 
01735                                                         if (totalImpulse>btScalar(0))
01736                                                         {
01737                                                                 solveManifold.m_lowerLimit = -(solveManifold.m_friction*totalImpulse);
01738                                                                 solveManifold.m_upperLimit = solveManifold.m_friction*totalImpulse;
01739 
01740                                                                 btScalar residual = resolveSingleConstraintRowGeneric(m_tmpSolverBodyPool[solveManifold.m_solverBodyIdA],m_tmpSolverBodyPool[solveManifold.m_solverBodyIdB],solveManifold);
01741                                                                 leastSquaresResidual += residual*residual;
01742                                                         }
01743                                                 }
01744                                         }
01745                                 }
01746 
01747                         }
01748                         else//SOLVER_INTERLEAVE_CONTACT_AND_FRICTION_CONSTRAINTS
01749                         {
01750                                 //solve the friction constraints after all contact constraints, don't interleave them
01751                                 int numPoolConstraints = m_tmpSolverContactConstraintPool.size();
01752                                 int j;
01753 
01754                                 for (j=0;j<numPoolConstraints;j++)
01755                                 {
01756                                         const btSolverConstraint& solveManifold = m_tmpSolverContactConstraintPool[m_orderTmpConstraintPool[j]];
01757                                         btScalar residual = resolveSingleConstraintRowLowerLimit(m_tmpSolverBodyPool[solveManifold.m_solverBodyIdA],m_tmpSolverBodyPool[solveManifold.m_solverBodyIdB],solveManifold);
01758                                         leastSquaresResidual += residual*residual;
01759                                 }
01760 
01761 
01762 
01764 
01765                                 int numFrictionPoolConstraints = m_tmpSolverContactFrictionConstraintPool.size();
01766                                 for (j=0;j<numFrictionPoolConstraints;j++)
01767                                 {
01768                                         btSolverConstraint& solveManifold = m_tmpSolverContactFrictionConstraintPool[m_orderFrictionConstraintPool[j]];
01769                                         btScalar totalImpulse = m_tmpSolverContactConstraintPool[solveManifold.m_frictionIndex].m_appliedImpulse;
01770 
01771                                         if (totalImpulse>btScalar(0))
01772                                         {
01773                                                 solveManifold.m_lowerLimit = -(solveManifold.m_friction*totalImpulse);
01774                                                 solveManifold.m_upperLimit = solveManifold.m_friction*totalImpulse;
01775 
01776                                                 btScalar residual = resolveSingleConstraintRowGeneric(m_tmpSolverBodyPool[solveManifold.m_solverBodyIdA],m_tmpSolverBodyPool[solveManifold.m_solverBodyIdB],solveManifold);
01777                                                 leastSquaresResidual += residual*residual;
01778                                         }
01779                                 }
01780                         }
01781 
01782 
01783                                 int numRollingFrictionPoolConstraints = m_tmpSolverContactRollingFrictionConstraintPool.size();
01784                                 for (int j=0;j<numRollingFrictionPoolConstraints;j++)
01785                                 {
01786 
01787                                         btSolverConstraint& rollingFrictionConstraint = m_tmpSolverContactRollingFrictionConstraintPool[j];
01788                                         btScalar totalImpulse = m_tmpSolverContactConstraintPool[rollingFrictionConstraint.m_frictionIndex].m_appliedImpulse;
01789                                         if (totalImpulse>btScalar(0))
01790                                         {
01791                                                 btScalar rollingFrictionMagnitude = rollingFrictionConstraint.m_friction*totalImpulse;
01792                                                 if (rollingFrictionMagnitude>rollingFrictionConstraint.m_friction)
01793                                                         rollingFrictionMagnitude = rollingFrictionConstraint.m_friction;
01794 
01795                                                 rollingFrictionConstraint.m_lowerLimit = -rollingFrictionMagnitude;
01796                                                 rollingFrictionConstraint.m_upperLimit = rollingFrictionMagnitude;
01797 
01798                                                 btScalar residual = resolveSingleConstraintRowGeneric(m_tmpSolverBodyPool[rollingFrictionConstraint.m_solverBodyIdA],m_tmpSolverBodyPool[rollingFrictionConstraint.m_solverBodyIdB],rollingFrictionConstraint);
01799                                                 leastSquaresResidual += residual*residual;
01800                                         }
01801                                 }
01802 
01803 
01804                 }
01805         return leastSquaresResidual;
01806 }
01807 
01808 
01809 void btSequentialImpulseConstraintSolver::solveGroupCacheFriendlySplitImpulseIterations(btCollisionObject** bodies,int numBodies,btPersistentManifold** manifoldPtr, int numManifolds,btTypedConstraint** constraints,int numConstraints,const btContactSolverInfo& infoGlobal,btIDebugDraw* debugDrawer)
01810 {
01811         int iteration;
01812         if (infoGlobal.m_splitImpulse)
01813         {
01814                 {
01815                         for ( iteration = 0;iteration<infoGlobal.m_numIterations;iteration++)
01816                         {
01817                                 btScalar leastSquaresResidual =0.f;
01818                                 {
01819                                         int numPoolConstraints = m_tmpSolverContactConstraintPool.size();
01820                                         int j;
01821                                         for (j=0;j<numPoolConstraints;j++)
01822                                         {
01823                                                 const btSolverConstraint& solveManifold = m_tmpSolverContactConstraintPool[m_orderTmpConstraintPool[j]];
01824 
01825                                                 btScalar residual = resolveSplitPenetrationImpulse(m_tmpSolverBodyPool[solveManifold.m_solverBodyIdA],m_tmpSolverBodyPool[solveManifold.m_solverBodyIdB],solveManifold);
01826                                                 leastSquaresResidual += residual*residual;
01827                                         }
01828                                 }
01829                                 if (leastSquaresResidual <= infoGlobal.m_leastSquaresResidualThreshold || iteration>=(infoGlobal.m_numIterations-1))
01830                                 {
01831 #ifdef VERBOSE_RESIDUAL_PRINTF
01832                                         printf("residual = %f at iteration #%d\n",leastSquaresResidual,iteration);
01833 #endif
01834                                         break;
01835                                 }
01836                         }
01837         }
01838         }
01839 }
01840 
01841 btScalar btSequentialImpulseConstraintSolver::solveGroupCacheFriendlyIterations(btCollisionObject** bodies ,int numBodies,btPersistentManifold** manifoldPtr, int numManifolds,btTypedConstraint** constraints,int numConstraints,const btContactSolverInfo& infoGlobal,btIDebugDraw* debugDrawer)
01842 {
01843         BT_PROFILE("solveGroupCacheFriendlyIterations");
01844 
01845         {
01847                 solveGroupCacheFriendlySplitImpulseIterations(bodies ,numBodies,manifoldPtr, numManifolds,constraints,numConstraints,infoGlobal,debugDrawer);
01848 
01849                 int maxIterations = m_maxOverrideNumSolverIterations > infoGlobal.m_numIterations? m_maxOverrideNumSolverIterations : infoGlobal.m_numIterations;
01850 
01851                 for ( int iteration = 0 ; iteration< maxIterations ; iteration++)
01852                 //for ( int iteration = maxIterations-1  ; iteration >= 0;iteration--)
01853                 {
01854                         m_leastSquaresResidual = solveSingleIteration(iteration, bodies ,numBodies,manifoldPtr, numManifolds,constraints,numConstraints,infoGlobal,debugDrawer);
01855 
01856                         if (m_leastSquaresResidual <= infoGlobal.m_leastSquaresResidualThreshold || (iteration>= (maxIterations-1)))
01857                         {
01858 #ifdef VERBOSE_RESIDUAL_PRINTF
01859                                                 printf("residual = %f at iteration #%d\n",m_leastSquaresResidual,iteration);
01860 #endif
01861                                 break;
01862                         }
01863                 }
01864 
01865         }
01866         return 0.f;
01867 }
01868 
01869 btScalar btSequentialImpulseConstraintSolver::solveGroupCacheFriendlyFinish(btCollisionObject** bodies,int numBodies,const btContactSolverInfo& infoGlobal)
01870 {
01871         int numPoolConstraints = m_tmpSolverContactConstraintPool.size();
01872         int i,j;
01873 
01874         if (infoGlobal.m_solverMode & SOLVER_USE_WARMSTARTING)
01875         {
01876                 for (j=0;j<numPoolConstraints;j++)
01877                 {
01878                         const btSolverConstraint& solveManifold = m_tmpSolverContactConstraintPool[j];
01879                         btManifoldPoint* pt = (btManifoldPoint*) solveManifold.m_originalContactPoint;
01880                         btAssert(pt);
01881                         pt->m_appliedImpulse = solveManifold.m_appliedImpulse;
01882                 //      float f = m_tmpSolverContactFrictionConstraintPool[solveManifold.m_frictionIndex].m_appliedImpulse;
01883                         //      printf("pt->m_appliedImpulseLateral1 = %f\n", f);
01884                         pt->m_appliedImpulseLateral1 = m_tmpSolverContactFrictionConstraintPool[solveManifold.m_frictionIndex].m_appliedImpulse;
01885                         //printf("pt->m_appliedImpulseLateral1 = %f\n", pt->m_appliedImpulseLateral1);
01886                         if ((infoGlobal.m_solverMode & SOLVER_USE_2_FRICTION_DIRECTIONS))
01887                         {
01888                                 pt->m_appliedImpulseLateral2 = m_tmpSolverContactFrictionConstraintPool[solveManifold.m_frictionIndex+1].m_appliedImpulse;
01889                         }
01890                         //do a callback here?
01891                 }
01892         }
01893 
01894         numPoolConstraints = m_tmpSolverNonContactConstraintPool.size();
01895         for (j=0;j<numPoolConstraints;j++)
01896         {
01897                 const btSolverConstraint& solverConstr = m_tmpSolverNonContactConstraintPool[j];
01898                 btTypedConstraint* constr = (btTypedConstraint*)solverConstr.m_originalContactPoint;
01899                 btJointFeedback* fb = constr->getJointFeedback();
01900                 if (fb)
01901                 {
01902                         fb->m_appliedForceBodyA += solverConstr.m_contactNormal1*solverConstr.m_appliedImpulse*constr->getRigidBodyA().getLinearFactor()/infoGlobal.m_timeStep;
01903                         fb->m_appliedForceBodyB += solverConstr.m_contactNormal2*solverConstr.m_appliedImpulse*constr->getRigidBodyB().getLinearFactor()/infoGlobal.m_timeStep;
01904                         fb->m_appliedTorqueBodyA += solverConstr.m_relpos1CrossNormal* constr->getRigidBodyA().getAngularFactor()*solverConstr.m_appliedImpulse/infoGlobal.m_timeStep;
01905                         fb->m_appliedTorqueBodyB += solverConstr.m_relpos2CrossNormal* constr->getRigidBodyB().getAngularFactor()*solverConstr.m_appliedImpulse/infoGlobal.m_timeStep; /*RGM ???? */
01906 
01907                 }
01908 
01909                 constr->internalSetAppliedImpulse(solverConstr.m_appliedImpulse);
01910                 if (btFabs(solverConstr.m_appliedImpulse)>=constr->getBreakingImpulseThreshold())
01911                 {
01912                         constr->setEnabled(false);
01913                 }
01914         }
01915 
01916 
01917 
01918         for ( i=0;i<m_tmpSolverBodyPool.size();i++)
01919         {
01920                 btRigidBody* body = m_tmpSolverBodyPool[i].m_originalBody;
01921                 if (body)
01922                 {
01923                         if (infoGlobal.m_splitImpulse)
01924                                 m_tmpSolverBodyPool[i].writebackVelocityAndTransform(infoGlobal.m_timeStep, infoGlobal.m_splitImpulseTurnErp);
01925                         else
01926                                 m_tmpSolverBodyPool[i].writebackVelocity();
01927 
01928                         m_tmpSolverBodyPool[i].m_originalBody->setLinearVelocity(
01929                                 m_tmpSolverBodyPool[i].m_linearVelocity+
01930                                 m_tmpSolverBodyPool[i].m_externalForceImpulse);
01931 
01932                         m_tmpSolverBodyPool[i].m_originalBody->setAngularVelocity(
01933                                 m_tmpSolverBodyPool[i].m_angularVelocity+
01934                                 m_tmpSolverBodyPool[i].m_externalTorqueImpulse);
01935 
01936                         if (infoGlobal.m_splitImpulse)
01937                                 m_tmpSolverBodyPool[i].m_originalBody->setWorldTransform(m_tmpSolverBodyPool[i].m_worldTransform);
01938 
01939                         m_tmpSolverBodyPool[i].m_originalBody->setCompanionId(-1);
01940                 }
01941         }
01942 
01943         m_tmpSolverContactConstraintPool.resizeNoInitialize(0);
01944         m_tmpSolverNonContactConstraintPool.resizeNoInitialize(0);
01945         m_tmpSolverContactFrictionConstraintPool.resizeNoInitialize(0);
01946         m_tmpSolverContactRollingFrictionConstraintPool.resizeNoInitialize(0);
01947 
01948         m_tmpSolverBodyPool.resizeNoInitialize(0);
01949         return 0.f;
01950 }
01951 
01952 
01953 
01955 btScalar btSequentialImpulseConstraintSolver::solveGroup(btCollisionObject** bodies,int numBodies,btPersistentManifold** manifoldPtr, int numManifolds,btTypedConstraint** constraints,int numConstraints,const btContactSolverInfo& infoGlobal,btIDebugDraw* debugDrawer,btDispatcher* /*dispatcher*/)
01956 {
01957 
01958         BT_PROFILE("solveGroup");
01959         //you need to provide at least some bodies
01960 
01961         solveGroupCacheFriendlySetup( bodies, numBodies, manifoldPtr,  numManifolds,constraints, numConstraints,infoGlobal,debugDrawer);
01962 
01963         solveGroupCacheFriendlyIterations(bodies, numBodies, manifoldPtr,  numManifolds,constraints, numConstraints,infoGlobal,debugDrawer);
01964 
01965         solveGroupCacheFriendlyFinish(bodies, numBodies, infoGlobal);
01966 
01967         return 0.f;
01968 }
01969 
01970 void    btSequentialImpulseConstraintSolver::reset()
01971 {
01972         m_btSeed2 = 0;
01973 }
